Hold assets
Bộ luật dân sự@346:
A lien on property

A lien is when the obligee (hereinafter referred to as the lien) is legally holding the property that is the subject of a bilateral contract to seize the property in case the obligor fails to perform or improperly performs the obligation.
Bộ luật dân sự@347:
Establishment of lien

1. A lien arises from the time when the obligation is due but the obligor fails to perform or improperly performs the obligation.

2. A lien on property takes effect against a third party from the time the lien takes possession of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@348:
Rights of the lien

1. Requiring the obligee to fully perform the obligations arising from the bilateral contract.

2. Require the obligor to make payment necessary expenses for the preservation and maintenance of the lien property.

3. To exploit the lien property to collect yields and profits if agreed by the obligor.

Value of the lien. exploitation of the lien property shall be offset against the obligor's obligation value.
Bộ luật dân sự@349:
Obligation of the lien

1. Maintain and preserve the lien.

2. Do not change the condition of the lien.

3. Not transfer or use the lien property without the consent of the obligor.

4. Return the lien property when the obligation has been performed.

5. Compensation for damage if loss or damage to the lien.
Bộ luật dân sự@351:
Civil liability due to breach of obligation

1. If an obligor violates an obligation, he/she shall bear civil liability towards the obligee.

Breach of an obligation is a the obligor fails to perform the obligation on time, incompletely performs the obligation or performs improperly the contents of the obligation.

2. In case the obligor fails to properly perform the obligation due to the failure of the obligor. force majeure events shall not be held civil liability, unless otherwise agreed upon or otherwise provided by law.

3. The obligor shall not bear civil liability if the obligor can prove the obligation. failure to perform is entirely the fault of the obligee.
Bộ luật dân sự@352:
Liability to continue performing the obligation

When the obligor fails to perform its obligations properly, the obligee is entitled to request the obligor to continue performing the obligation.
Bộ luật dân sự@353:
Delay in performance of an obligation

1. Late performance of an obligation means that an obligation has not yet been performed or is only partially performed when the time limit for performance of the obligation has expired.

2. The party that is late in performing the obligation must immediately notify the obligee of its failure to perform the obligation on time.
Bộ luật dân sự@354:
Postponement of performance of obligations

1. When it is impossible to perform an obligation on time, the obligor must immediately notify the obligee and request a postponement of the performance of the obligation. .

In case the obligee fails to notify the obligee, the obligor must compensate for any arising damage, unless otherwise agreed upon or cannot notify the obligee due to objective reasons.

2. The obligee is entitled to postpone the performance of the obligation, if so agreed by the obligee.
Bộ luật dân sự@355:
Delay in receiving the performance of an obligation

1. Delay in receiving the performance of an obligation is when the time for the performance of an obligation is reached and the obligor has performed but the obligee does not accept the performance of such obligation.

2. In case of delay in receiving the object of the obligation which is property, the obligor may deposit the property at the place of deposit and keep the property or take other necessary measures. in order to preserve the property and have the right to demand payment of reasonable expenses.In case the property is deposited, the obligor must immediately notify the obligee.

3. For the property at risk. damaged, the obligor has the right to sell such property and must immediately notify the obligee and pay the obligee the proceeds from the sale of the property after deducting reasonable expenses for preservation and sale. that property.
Bộ luật dân sự@356:
Liability for failure to perform the obligation to deliver the object

1. In case the obligation to hand over a specific object is not performed, the aggrieved party has the right to request the infringing party to deliver the correct object; if the object is no longer available or damaged, the value of the object must be paid for.

2. If the obligation to deliver the object of the same type is not performed, the aggrieved party has the right to request the infringing party to hand over the object together. If there is no other object of the same type to replace it, the value of the object must be paid.

3. In case the breach of an obligation specified in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article causes damage to the affected party . In case of violation, the violating party must compensate for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@357:
Liability due to late performance of payment obligation

1. In case the obligor is late to pay, that party must pay interest on the amount of late payment corresponding to the late payment period.

2. The interest rate arising due to late payment is determined by agreement of the parties but must not exceed the interest rate specified in Clause 1, Article 468 of this Code; if there is no agreement, the interest rate shall be applied. as prescribed in Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@358:
Liability due to failure to perform or not to perform a task

1. Where the obligor fails to perform a task that it is obliged to perform, the obligee may request the obligee to do so. obliged to continue to perform or perform it himself or assign another person to perform such work and demand the obligor to pay reasonable costs and compensate for damage.

2. When the obligor If the obligee is not allowed to perform a job but does it, the obligee is entitled to request the obligor to terminate the performance, restore the original condition and pay compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@359:
Liability due to delay in receiving the performance of the obligation

The obligee that is late in receiving the performance of an obligation, causing damage to the obligor, must compensate that party and must bear all risks and expenses arising from the time of delay, unless otherwise provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@360:
Liability to compensate for damage caused by breach of obligation

In case of damage caused by breach of obligation, the obligor must compensate for all damage, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@361:
Damage for breach of duty

1. Damage for breach of duty includes material damage and mental damage.

2. Material damage is damage actual and identifiable physical loss, including loss of property, reasonable costs to prevent, limit, remedy the damage, and actual lost or reduced income.

3. Damage Mental harm is a mental loss caused by being infringed upon the life, health, honor, dignity, reputation and other personal interests of a subject.
Bộ luật dân sự@362:
Obligation to prevent and limit damage

The obligee must take necessary and reasonable measures to prevent damage from occurring or limit damage to itself.
Bộ luật dân sự@363:
Compensation for damage in case the aggrieved party is at fault

In case of breach of an obligation and the damage is partly the fault of the aggrieved party, the aggrieved party only has to compensate for the damage. harm commensurate with the extent of his fault.
Bộ luật dân sự@364:
Fault in civil liability

Fault in civil liability includes willful error, unintentional error.

Intentional error is a situation where a person is aware that his or her actions will cause harm. harm to others and still do it and want to or, though unwillingly, allow the damage to happen.

Unintentional fault is a situation where a person does not foresee his or her conduct having the potential to cause harm. , even though he should have known or could have known in advance that the damage would occur, or foresaw that his conduct was likely to cause damage, but assumed that the damage would not have occurred or could have been prevented.
Bộ luật dân sự@365:
Assignment of the right to demand

1. The party with the right to demand performance of the obligation may transfer that right to demand to the subrogator as agreed, except in the following cases:

a ) The right to demand alimony, claim compensation for damage caused by infringing upon life, health, honor, dignity and reputation;

b) The obligee and the obligor have an agreement or law The law provides for the non-transfer of the right to claim.

2. When the obligee transfers the right to claim to the subrogator, the subrogator becomes the claimant. request without the consent of the obligor.

The requestor must notify the obligee in writing of the assignment of the right to claim, unless otherwise agreed. . In case the licensor of the right to request fails to notify the transfer of the right and incurs expenses for the obligor, the requesting licensor must pay these costs.
Bộ luật dân sự@366:
Obligation to provide information and transfer documents

1. The licensor requests to provide necessary information, and transfers relevant documents to the subrogator.

2. If the transferor of the right to claim violates the obligations specified in Clause 1 of this Article, causing damage, he/she must compensate for the damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@367:
No liability after the transfer of the right to claim

The assignor of the right to claim is not responsible for the obligor's ability to perform the obligation after the assignment of the right to claim, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@368:
Transfer of the right to demand security for the performance of an obligation

In case the right to claim the performance of an obligation includes a security, the transfer of the right to claim includes a security measure there.
Bộ luật dân sự@369:
The obligor's right to refuse

1. Where the obligor is not notified of the transfer of the right to claim and the assignor fails to prove the authenticity of the assignment the obligee has the right to demand, the obligor has the right to refuse to perform the obligation towards the subrogator.

2. In case the obligee has not been notified of the transfer of the right to demand, the obligor has already performed it. obligations towards the assignor of the right to claim, the subrogator may not require the obligor to perform the obligation towards him or her.
Bộ luật dân sự@370:
Transfer of the obligation

1. The obligor may assign the obligation to the obligee if so agreed by the obligee, unless the obligation is attached to the creditor's identity. the obligation or the law stipulates that the obligation cannot be transferred.

2. When an obligation is transferred, the obligor becomes the obligor.
Bộ luật dân sự@371:
Transfer of an obligation with a security

In case an obligation with a security is transferred, that security will terminate, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@373:
Performance of an obligation

Obligation is fulfilled when the obligor has performed the entire obligation or performed a part of the obligation, but the remainder is waived by the obligee.
Bộ luật dân sự@374:
Complete the obligation in case the obligee is late in receiving the object of the obligation

When the obligee is late in receiving the object of the obligation which is property, the obligation is completed at the time the obligee is property has been deposited at the place of depository under the provisions of Clause 2, Article 355 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@375:
Termination of obligations under agreement

The parties may agree to terminate their obligations at any time, but must not cause damage to national interests, ethnic groups, public interests, legitimate rights and interests of others.
Bộ luật dân sự@376:
Termination of an obligation due to an exemption from performance

1. An obligation terminates when the obligee exempts the obligee from performing the obligation, unless otherwise provided for by law. .

2. When the obligation with a security is waived, the security interest will also terminate.
Bộ luật dân sự@377:
Termination of an obligation because it is replaced by another obligation

1. If the parties agree to replace the original obligation with another, the original obligation shall terminate.

2 The obligation also terminates, if the obligee has taken over the property or other work in place of the pre-agreed property or work.

3. Where the obligation is the obligation to support or compensate Damage caused by infringing upon life, health, honor, dignity, reputation and other personal obligations that cannot be transferred to another person shall not be replaced by another obligation.
Bộ luật dân sự@378:
Termination of an obligation due to clearing of obligations

1. In case the parties have an obligation on property of the same type towards each other, they are not required to perform obligations towards each other when they are due at the same time. and the obligation is deemed terminated, unless otherwise provided for by law.

2. Where the value of the property or work is not equivalent, the parties shall pay each other for the difference in value. .

3. Things that are valued for money can also offset the obligation to pay.
Bộ luật dân sự@380:
Termination of an obligation by merging the obligor and the obligee

When the obligor becomes the obligee to the same obligation, the obligation terminates.
Bộ luật dân sự@381:
Termination due to the expiration of the statute of limitations for discharge of obligations

When the statute of limitations for discharge has expired, the obligation shall terminate.
Bộ luật dân sự@382:
Terminate an obligation when the obligee being an individual dies or the legal entity ceases to exist

When the parties have an agreement or the law provides that the obligation is performed only for individuals if a person or legal entity is the party with the right, if the individual dies or the juridical person ceases to exist, the obligation also terminates.
Bộ luật dân sự@383:
Termination of the obligation when the specific object is no longer available

The obligation to deliver the object is terminated in the event that the object to be delivered is the specific object no longer exists.

The parties may agree to substitute another object. or compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@384:
Termination of obligations in case of bankruptcy

In case of bankruptcy, obligations shall be terminated in accordance with the Bankruptcy Law.
Bộ luật dân sự@385:
Concept of contract

A contract is an agreement between parties on the establishment, change or termination of civil rights and obligations.
Bộ luật dân sự@386:
Offer to enter into a contract

1. Offer to enter into a contract is a clear expression of the offeror's intention to enter into a contract and to be bound by this offer to the party that has entered into a contract. identified or to the public (hereinafter referred to as the offeree).

2. In the case of an offer to enter into a contract, the time limit for reply shall be clearly stated, if the offeror re-enters the contract with the third party, while waiting for the offeree's reply, must compensate the offeree for damage that is not allowed to enter into a contract if any damage is incurred.
Bộ luật dân sự@387:
Information in the conclusion of a contract

1. In case one party has information that affects the other party's acceptance to enter into a contract, it must notify the other party.

2 Where a party receives confidential information of the other party during the process of entering into a contract, it is responsible for keeping the information confidential and must not use such information for its own purposes or for illegal purposes. other.

3. If the party violating the provisions of Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article causes damage, it must compensate.
Bộ luật dân sự@389:
Change, withdraw the offer to enter into the contract

1. The party offering to enter into the contract may change or withdraw the offer to enter into the contract in the following cases:

a) The offeree receives a notice of the change or withdrawal of the offer before or at the same time as the receipt of the offer;

b) The conditions for the change or withdrawal of the offer arise in the event that the offeree the offer clearly states that the offer can be changed or withdrawn when such conditions arise.

2. When the offeror changes the content of the offer, it is a new offer.
Bộ luật dân sự@390:
Cancellation of the offer to enter into a contract

The offeror may cancel the offer if this right is clearly stated in the offer and the offeree receives notice of the cancellation withdraw the offer before this person sends a notice of acceptance of the offer to enter into a contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@392:
Modification of the offer proposed by the offeree

When the offeree has accepted to enter into a contract but conditions or amendments to the offer are stated, it shall be deemed that this person has made an offer new proposal.
Bộ luật dân sự@393:
Accepting the offer to enter into a contract

1. Accepting an offer to enter into a contract is the offeree's reply to the offeree's acceptance of the entire content of the offer.

2. The offeree's silence shall not be considered as acceptance of the offer to enter into a contract, unless there is an agreement or according to established habits between the parties.
Bộ luật dân sự@394:
Time limit for replying to acceptance of the contract

1. When the offeror has fixed a time limit for reply, the reply to accept shall only take effect when it is made within that time limit; if the offeror receives a reply when the time limit for reply has expired, this acceptance shall be considered as a new offer of the party that is late in replying.

When the offeror does not specify the time limit for reply, the acceptance reply is only valid if it is made within a reasonable time.

2. In case the notice of acceptance of contract conclusion is delayed due to objective reasons that the offeror knows or must know. for this objective reason, the notice of acceptance of the contract is still valid, unless the offeror immediately replies that he disagrees with the offeree's acceptance.

3. When the parties directly communicate with each other, even in the case of telephone or other means, the offeree must immediately reply with acceptance or non-acceptance, unless the parties have agreed on a time limit for replying. .
Bộ luật dân sự@395:
In case the offeror dies, loses his/her civil act capacity or has difficulties in cognition and behavior control

In case the offeror dies or loses act capacity After the respondent accepts to enter into a contract or has difficulties in perception or behavior control, the offer to enter into a contract is still valid, unless the content of the contract is attached to the contract. personality of the proposer.
Bộ luật dân sự@396:
In case the offeree dies, loses his/her civil act capacity or has difficulties in cognition and behavior control

In case the offeree has accepted the contract contract but later dies, loses the capacity for civil acts or has difficulties in perception and behavior control, the reply to accept the conclusion of the contract is still valid, unless the content of the contract is attached to the contract. with the proposed party's identity.
Bộ luật dân sự@397:
Withdrawal of notice of acceptance to enter into contract

The offeree may withdraw the notice of acceptance to enter into contract, if the notice of such withdrawal comes before or together with the time when the offeror receives a reply accepting the conclusion of the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@399:
Place for entering into a contract

The place for entering into a contract shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the place for entering into a contract is the place of residence of the individual or the head office of the law. has made an offer to enter into a contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@400:
Time of contract conclusion

1. The contract is concluded at the time the offeror receives acceptance of the contract.

2. If the parties agree to remain silent, the If the respondent accepts to enter into a contract within a certain period of time, the time of entering into a contract is the last time of that time limit.

3. The time of entering into a verbal contract is the time when the parties have reached an agreement. agree on the content of the contract.

4. The time of entering into a written contract is the time when the last party signs the document or by another form of acceptance shown in the document.

Field If a contract is entered into orally and then in writing, the time of contract conclusion shall be determined according to Clause 3 of this Article.
Bộ luật dân sự@401:
Validity of contract

1. A legally entered contract shall take effect from the time of signing, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by relevant law.

2. From the time the contract takes effect, the parties must perform their rights and obligations towards each other as committed.The contract can only be modified or canceled as agreed by the parties or in accordance with the provisions of law. the law.
Bộ luật dân sự@403:
Contract addendum

1. A contract may have an appendix attached to it detailing some terms of the contract. The contract addendum has the same effect as the contract. The contract appendix must not be contrary to the contents of the contract.

2. In case the contract appendix contains a clause contrary to the content of the contract's terms, this provision shall not take effect, unless otherwise stated. otherwise agreed. If the parties accept the contract appendix containing a clause contrary to the terms of the contract, it shall be considered that such clause in the contract has been modified.
Bộ luật dân sự@404:
Contract interpretation

1. When a contract has an unclear term, the interpretation of that term must not only be based on the wording of the contract but also on the will of the parties. expressed in the entire process before, at the time of establishment and performance of the contract.

2. When a contract has terms or words that can be understood in many different meanings, it must be interpreted according to the appropriate meaning. consistent with the purpose and nature of the contract.

3. When a contract contains terms or words that are difficult to understand, it must be explained according to custom at the place where the contract is concluded.

4. the terms of the contract must be interpreted in relation to each other, so that the meaning of the terms is consistent with the entire contract.

5. Where there is a conflict between the common will of the parties with the words used in the contract, the common will of the parties is used to interpret the contract.

6. In case the drafting party introduces into the contract content that is unfavorable to the other party, when interpreting contract must be in favor of the other party.
Bộ luật dân sự@405:
Sample contract

1. A model contract is a contract consisting of provisions made by one party in a form for the other party to respond within a reasonable time; if the offeree is to pay Acceptance shall be considered as acceptance of the entire contents of the contract according to the form offered by the offeror.

The form contract must be made public so that the offeree knows or must know about the contents of the contract. contract.

The order and manner of publicizing the contract according to the form shall comply with the provisions of law.

2. In case the model contract contains unclear terms, the party shall issue the model contract. be disadvantaged when interpreting that provision.

3. Where a model contract contains a provision that exempts the party offering the model contract from liability, increases liability or eliminates the other party's legitimate interests. then this provision shall have no effect, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@406:
General trading conditions in contract conclusion

1. General trading conditions are stable terms published by one party for general application to the offeree; if the offeree accepts to enter into a contract, it shall be deemed to have accepted these terms.

2. General trading conditions are only valid for the party that established the transaction in the event that such trading conditions have been established. be made public so that the party establishing the transaction knows or must know about that condition.

The order and manner of disclosing the general trading conditions shall comply with the law.

3. Terms of delivery In case the general transaction conditions contain provisions on exemption from liability of the party providing the general transaction conditions, increasing liability or eliminating the legitimate interests of the other party, This provision shall not take effect, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@407:
The contract is void

1. The provisions on invalid civil transactions from Articles 123 to Article 133 of this Code also apply to invalid contracts.

2. invalidity of the main contract will terminate the sub-contract, unless the parties have agreed that the sub-contract may replace the main contract.This provision does not apply to measures to secure the performance of obligations.
 
3. The invalidity of the sub-contract does not terminate the main contract, unless the parties agree that the sub-contract is an integral part of the main contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@408:
The contract is void because there is an object that can't be performed

1. If, right from the moment of the conclusion, the contract has an object that can't be performed, this contract will be invalidated.

2. In case, when entering into a contract, one party knows or ought to know that there is an object that cannot be performed but fails to notify the other party, so the other party has entered into the contract, it must pay compensation. damage to the other party, unless the other party knows or ought to know that the contract has an unenforceable object.

3. The provisions of Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article also apply to schools. contract with one or more parts of the object that are unenforceable, but the remainder of the contract remains in effect.

Subsection 2

IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CONTRACT
Bộ luật dân sự@409:
Performance of a unilateral contract

For a unilateral contract, the obligor must perform the obligation exactly as agreed, only before or after the time limit if so agreed by the obligee Agree.
Bộ luật dân sự@410:
Performance of a bilateral contract

1. In a bilateral contract, when the parties have agreed on a time limit for performance of an obligation, each party must perform its obligation when it is due; not postponement of performance on the ground that the other party has not yet performed its obligations, except for the cases specified in Articles 411 and 413 of this Code.

2. In case the parties do not agree on which party to perform the obligations. If an obligation cannot be performed at the same time, whichever obligation takes longer to perform, that obligation must be performed first.
Bộ luật dân sự@411:
Right to postpone the performance of an obligation in a bilateral contract

1. The party that has to perform the obligation first has the right to postpone the performance of the obligation, if the other party's ability to perform the obligation has been impaired. is so serious that it cannot perform the obligation as committed until the other party is able to perform the obligation or has measures to secure the performance of the obligation.

2. The party must perform the obligation. The latter has the right to postpone the performance of a due obligation if the previous obligor has not yet performed its obligation when it is due.
Bộ luật dân sự@412:
Liety of property in a bilateral contract

In case the obligor fails to properly perform its obligations, the obligee establishes a lien over the obligee's property services under the provisions of Articles 346 to 350 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@413:
Obligation cannot be performed due to one party's fault

In a bilateral contract, when one party fails to perform its obligation due to the other party's fault, it has the right to require the other party to still have to perform his obligations or cancel the contract and claim damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@414:
Failure to perform an obligation but no fault of the parties

In a bilateral contract, if one party fails to perform an obligation but both parties are not at fault, the party cannot perform the obligation. If a party has performed part of an obligation, it has the right to request the other party to perform the corresponding part of the obligation towards itself.
Bộ luật dân sự@415:
Performing a contract for the benefit of a third party

When performing a contract for the benefit of a third party, the third party has the right to directly demand the obligor to perform the obligation against itself; if the parties to the contract have a dispute over the performance of the contract, the third party is not entitled to demand the performance of the obligation until the dispute is resolved.

The obligee may also require the obligor to perform the contract for the benefit of a third party.
Bộ luật dân sự@416:
The right to refuse of a third party

1. In case the third party denies its benefits before the obligor performs the obligation, the obligor is not required to perform the obligation, but must notify the obligee and the contract is deemed cancelled, the parties must return to each other what has been received.

2. In case the third party refuses its benefits after the party has the obligee has performed the obligation, the obligation is considered to have been fulfilled and the obligee still has to perform the commitment towards the obligor.In this case, the benefit arising from the contract belongs to the party that if if the contract is not for the benefit of a third party, they shall be the beneficiaries, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@417:
Do not modify or cancel the contract for the benefit of the third party

When the third party has agreed to enjoy the benefits, even though the contract has not been performed, the contracting parties also may not modify or cancel the contract, except with the consent of a third party.
Bộ luật dân sự@418:
Agreement on penalty for violation

1. Penalty for violation is an agreement between the parties in a contract, whereby the breaching party must pay a sum of money to the aggrieved party.

2. The level of fines for violation shall be agreed upon by the parties, unless otherwise provided for by relevant laws.

3. The parties may agree that the breaching party shall only have to pay the penalty for the violation, but not have to compensate for damage or must both pay a penalty for the violation and have to pay compensation for it.

In case the parties have an agreement on the penalty for violation but do not agree on both the penalty for the violation and the compensation for the damage. damage, the party in breach of the obligation shall only have to pay a penalty for the breach.
Bộ luật dân sự@419:
Compensated damage due to breach of contract

1. Damage to be compensated for breach of contractual obligations is determined according to the provisions of Clause 2 of this Article, Article 13 and Article 360 of this Code.

2. The obligee may claim damages for benefits which he or she would otherwise enjoy under the contract.The obligee may also demand the obligee to pay expenses. pay expenses incurred due to non-fulfillment of contractual obligations that do not overlap with the level of compensation for benefits brought by the contract.

3. At the request of the obligee, the Court may force the obligor to pay compensation for mental damage to the obligee. The level of compensation shall be decided by the court based on the contents of the case.
Bộ luật dân sự@421:
Modification of the contract

1. The parties may agree to amend the contract.

2. The contract may be modified in accordance with the provisions of Article 420 of this Code.
 
3. The revised contract must follow the form of the original contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@423:
Cancellation of contract

1. One party has the right to cancel the contract and not have to pay compensation in the following cases:

a) The other party's breach of the contract is a condition of cancellation cancellation as agreed by the parties;

b) The other party seriously violates the contractual obligations;

c) Other cases prescribed by law.

2. A serious breach is the failure to perform properly perform the obligations of one party to the extent that the other party fails to achieve the purpose of entering into the contract.

3. The party canceling the contract must immediately notify the other party of the cancellation, otherwise notices that cause damage must be compensated.
Bộ luật dân sự@424:
Cancellation of contract due to late performance of obligations

1. In case the obligor fails to properly perform the obligation but the obligee requests performance of the obligation within a reasonable time, but If the obligee fails to perform, the obligee may cancel the contract.

2. In case due to the nature of the contract or the will of the parties, the contract will not achieve the purpose if it is not performed. If the obligor fails to properly perform the obligation within a certain period of time, the other party has the right to cancel the contract without having to comply with the provisions of Clause 1 of this Article.
Bộ luật dân sự@425:
Cancellation of contract due to inability to perform

In case the obligor is unable to perform part or all of its obligation, making the obligee's purpose unattainable If so, the obligee may cancel the contract and claim damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@426:
Cancel the contract in case the property is lost or damaged

In case one party loses or damages the property that is the subject of the contract, it cannot be returned or compensated by other property or cannot be repaired or replaced with property of the same type, the other party has the right to cancel the contract.

The violating party must compensate in cash equal to the value of the lost or damaged property. , unless otherwise agreed or prescribed in Clauses 2 and 3, Article 351 and Article 363 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@427:
Consequences of contract cancellation

1. When the contract is canceled, the contract will not take effect from the time of signing, the parties are not required to perform the agreed obligations, except agreement on penalty for breach, compensation for damage and agreement on dispute settlement.

2. The parties must return to each other what they have received after deducting reasonable expenses in contract performance and expenses. property maintenance and development fees.

The return is done in kind.If it is not possible to return it in kind, it will be refunded in cash.

If the parties have the same If the party is obliged to repay, the refund must be made at the same time, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.

3. The party suffers damage due to the party's breach of its obligations. the other person is compensated.

4. The settlement of consequences of the cancellation of a contract related to moral rights shall be provided for by this Code and other relevant laws.

5. In case of cancellation If the contract has no grounds as prescribed in Articles 423, 424, 425 and 426 of this Code, the party canceling the contract shall be determined to be the party in breach of the obligation and must perform civil liability for failing to properly perform the contract. obligations under this Code and other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@428:
To unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract

1. One party has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and not have to pay compensation when the other party seriously violates the obligations in the contract or As agreed by the parties or provided for by law.

2. The party unilaterally terminating the performance of the contract must immediately notify the other party of the termination of the contract. must compensate.

3. When the contract is unilaterally terminated, the contract shall terminate from the time the other party receives the termination notice. Agreement on fines for violations, compensation for damage and agreement on dispute settlement.The party that has performed the obligation has the right to demand the other party to pay the part of the obligation performed.

4. the other party's act of failure to perform properly its contractual obligations shall be compensated.

5. In case the unilateral termination of contract performance has no grounds specified in Clause 1 of this Article, the party shall unilaterally terminate the contract. termination of contract performance is determined to be the party in breach of obligations and must perform civil obligations in accordance with the provisions of this Code and other relevant laws due to failure to properly perform the obligations in the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@429:
The statute of limitations for initiating a lawsuit over a contract

The statute of limitations for initiating a lawsuit to request a court to settle a contract dispute is 3 years from the date the claimant knows or must know his rights and interests. your legitimacy is infringed.
Bộ luật dân sự@430:
Property purchase and sale contract

Property purchase and sale contract is an agreement between parties whereby the seller transfers ownership of the property to the buyer and the buyer pays the seller. 

House purchase and sale contracts, house purchase and sale contracts for other purposes shall comply with the provisions of this Code, the Law on Housing and other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@431:
Object of sale contract

1. Any property specified in this Code can be the subject of a sale and purchase contract. or restricted from being transferred, the property that is the subject of the sale and purchase contract must comply with such provisions.

2. The property sold belongs to the seller or the seller has the right to sell.
Bộ luật dân sự@432:
Quality of the property for sale and purchase

1. The quality of the property for sale and purchase shall be agreed upon by the parties.

2. Where the quality standard of the property has been announced or prescribed by a competent state agency, the parties' agreement on the quality of the property must not be lower than the quality of the property as determined according to published standards or as prescribed by a competent state agency. authority.

3. When the parties do not have an agreement or an unclear agreement on the quality of the properties for sale and purchase, the quality of the properties for sale and purchase shall be determined according to the quality standards of the properties already approved. announced, regulations of competent state agencies or according to industry standards.

In case there are no standards for quality of properties that have been announced, regulations of competent state agencies and industry standards, the quality of purchased and sold properties shall be determined according to normal standards or according to specific standards suitable for the purpose of entering into contracts and in accordance with the provisions of the Law on Protection of Consumer Rights.
Bộ luật dân sự@433:
Price and payment method

1. Price and payment method shall be agreed upon by the parties or determined by a third party at the request of the parties. the payment method must comply with the regulations of the competent state agency, the agreement of the parties must be consistent with that provision.

2. In case there is no agreement or the agreement is unclear on the price, method the payment method, the price is determined according to the market price, the payment method is determined according to the custom at the place and time of signing the contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@434:
Term for performance of the sale and purchase contract

1. The term for performance of the sale and purchase contract shall be agreed upon by the parties. The seller must deliver the property to the purchaser within the agreed time limit; the seller must the property may only be delivered before or after the time limit if agreed by the buyer.

2. When the parties do not agree on the time limit for property delivery, the buyer has the right to request the seller to hand over the property and the seller also has the right to hand over the property. the right to demand that the buyer receive the property at any time, but must give each other a reasonable time in advance.

3. The buyer pays the purchase amount according to the agreed time. If the payment time is clear, the buyer must pay immediately at the time of receiving the purchased property or receiving the document certifying the ownership of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@435:
Place of property delivery

Place of property delivery shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the provisions of Clause 2, Article 277 of this Code shall apply.
Bộ luật dân sự@436:
Method of delivery of property

1. Property is delivered by a method agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the property shall be delivered by the seller once and directly to the buyer.

2. If, as agreed, the seller delivers the property to the buyer in several installments but the seller fails to perform his obligations at a certain time, the buyer may cancel the part of the contract related to the breach. breach and claim damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@438:
Responsibility due to asynchronous delivery of objects

1. In case the delivered object is not synchronized, making the use purpose of the object unattainable, the buyer has one of the following rights:
 
a) Receive and request the seller to communicate the missing part or part, claim damages, and delay payment of the part or part received until the item is delivered in sync;

b) Cancellation contract and claim for damages.

2. In case the buyer has paid but has not yet received the object due to asynchronous delivery, interest shall be paid on the amount already paid at the interest rate agreed between the parties but must not exceed the interest rate specified in Clause 1, Article 468 of this Code; if there is no agreement, the provisions of Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code shall be complied with and request the seller to compensate for damage caused by asynchronous delivery, from the time the contract must be performed until the object is delivered synchronously.
Bộ luật dân sự@440:
Obligation to pay

1. The buyer is obliged to pay the money according to the time, place and amount specified in the contract.

2. In case the parties only agree If the parties do not agree on the time limit for delivery of the property and the time for payment, the buyer must make payment. payment at the time of receiving the property.

3. In case the buyer fails to properly perform the payment obligation, he/she must pay interest on the late payment amount as prescribed in Article 357 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@441:
Time to bear the risk

1. The seller bears the risk of the asset before the property is delivered to the buyer, the buyer bears the risk of the asset from the time of receipt of the asset. , unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.

2. For property sale and purchase contracts where the law requires that such property be registered, the seller bears the risk until When completing the registration procedure, the buyer bears the risk from the time of completing the registration procedure, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@442:
Transportation costs and costs related to the transfer of ownership

1. Shipping costs and costs related to the transfer of ownership are agreed upon by the parties, unless otherwise required by law. The law provides otherwise.

2. In case the parties do not reach an agreement or the agreement is unclear, the transportation costs and costs related to the transfer of ownership are determined according to the published costs. declarations, regulations of competent agencies or according to industry standards.

3. If there are no grounds for determination as prescribed in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article, transportation costs and related costs related to the transfer of ownership rights shall be determined according to common standards or specific standards suitable for the purpose of entering into a contract.

4. Where there is no agreement between the parties and the law does not provide for shipping costs and costs associated with the transfer of title, the seller must bear the costs of transportation to the place of delivery of the property and the costs associated with the transfer of title.
Bộ luật dân sự@443:
Obligation to provide information and instructions on how to use

The seller is obliged to provide the buyer with necessary information about the purchased property and instructions on how to use it; if If the seller fails to perform this obligation, the buyer has the right to request the seller to perform within a reasonable time; if the seller still fails to perform, causing the buyer to fail to achieve the purpose of entering into the contract, the buyer reserves the right to cancel the contract and claim damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@444:
Security of ownership of the purchased property

1. The seller is obliged to ensure that the ownership right to the property sold to the buyer is not disputed by a third party. .

2. In case the property is disputed by a third party, the seller must side with the buyer to protect the interests of the buyer; if the third party has the right to own part or all of the purchased property If the buyer knows or should know that the property is owned by a third party but still buys it, the buyer must pay the seller. return the property to the owner and have no right to claim damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@445:
Assurance of the quality of the object for sale and purchase

1. The seller must guarantee the use value or the characteristics of the object for sale and purchase; if after the purchase, the buyer discovers a defect that devalues or reduce the use value of the purchased object, the seller must immediately notify the seller when detecting defects and have the right to request the seller to repair, exchange the defective object for another object, reduce the price and compensate for damage. , unless otherwise agreed.

2. The seller must ensure that the item for sale matches the description on the package, the trademark or the model selected by the buyer.

3. The seller is not responsible for the defects of the object in the following cases:

a) Defects that the buyer knew or ought to know when buying;

b) Auctioned objects, objects sold in second hand store;

c) The buyer is at fault for causing the defect of the item.
Bộ luật dân sự@446:
Warranty obligations

The seller is obliged to provide a warranty for the items purchased and sold for a period of time, called the warranty period, if the warranty is agreed upon by the parties or provided for by law. determined.

The warranty period is calculated from the time when the buyer is obliged to receive the item.
Bộ luật dân sự@447:
The right to claim the warranty

During the warranty period, if the buyer discovers a defect in the purchased object, it has the right to request the seller to repair it without paying, reduce the price, or exchange the object. disabled take another object or return the item and get a refund.
Bộ luật dân sự@448:
Repair the object within the warranty period

1. The seller must repair the object and ensure that the object meets the quality standards or has all the promised characteristics.

2. The seller bears the costs of repairing and transporting the object to the place of repair and from the place of repair to the residence or headquarters of the buyer.

3. The buyer has the right to require the seller to complete the repair. within the time limit agreed upon by the parties or within a reasonable time; if the seller cannot repair or cannot complete the repair within that time limit, the buyer has the right to request a discount or exchange of defective items. take something else or return it and get your money back.
Bộ luật dân sự@449:
Compensation for damage within the warranty period

1. In addition to requesting the implementation of warranty measures, the buyer has the right to request the seller to compensate for damage caused by technical defects of the seller. object caused during the warranty period.

2. The seller is not required to compensate for damage if it can prove that the damage occurred due to the fault of the buyer. take necessary measures to prevent and limit damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@450:
Purchase and sell property rights

1. In case of purchase and sale of property rights, the seller must transfer papers and carry out procedures for transferring ownership to the buyer, the buyer must pay the seller. 

2. In case the property right is a debt collection right and the seller commits to guarantee the debtor's solvency, the seller must be jointly responsible for payment, if the debtor fails to pay when due. pay.

3. The time of transfer of ownership of a property right is the time when the buyer receives the papers on the ownership of such property or from the time of registration of the transfer of ownership, if provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@451:
Auction of property

Property may be auctioned according to the will of the owner or according to the provisions of law. Property under common ownership to be auctioned must have the consent of the owner. consent of all common owners, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.

The auction of assets must ensure the principles of objectivity, publicity, transparency, and confidentiality. ensure the legitimate rights and interests of the participating parties and comply with the law on asset auction.
Bộ luật dân sự@452:
Purchase after trial use

1. The parties may agree that the purchaser is entitled to try the purchased item for a period called the trial period. During the trial period, the purchaser shall may answer to buy or not to buy; if the trial period expires but the buyer does not reply, it is considered to have accepted the purchase under the agreed conditions before receiving the trial item.

In case the parties do not agreement or agreement is unclear about the trial period, this term is determined according to the custom of transactions with objects of the same type.

2. During the trial period, the object remains in the possession of the party. The seller must bear all risks of the object, unless otherwise agreed.During the trial period, the seller may not sell, donate, lease, exchange, mortgage or pledge the property. property when the buyer has not yet replied.

3. In case the trial party replies that it does not buy, it must return the item to the seller and must compensate the seller for damage, if it is lost or damaged. The Trial Party is not responsible for normal wear and tear caused by the trial and does not have to return the profits resulting from the trial.
Bộ luật dân sự@453:
Buy by deferred payment, by installment payment

1. The parties may agree on the purchaser's deferred payment or installment payment for a period of time after receiving the purchased property. The seller is entitled to reserve the rights. Ownership of the sold property until the buyer pays in full, unless otherwise agreed.

2. The purchase contract with deferred payment or installment payment must be made in writing. purchased property with deferred payment, installment payment and must bear the risk during use, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@454:
Redemption of the sold property

1. The seller may agree with the buyer on the right to redeem the sold property after a period called the redemption period.

Redemption period The return of property shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, the time limit for redemption shall not exceed 01 year for movable property and 05 years for immovable property from the time of property handover, except for cases of relevant law. Within this period, the seller has the right to redeem it at any time, but must notify the buyer in advance within a reasonable time.Ranemption price is the market price at the time and place of redemption. , unless otherwise agreed.

2. During the redemption period, the purchaser may not establish a transaction to transfer the ownership of the property to another entity and must bear all risks to the property, except for the otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@455:
Contract for exchange of property

1. An asset exchange contract is an agreement between parties whereby the parties transfer property and transfer ownership of the property to each other.

2. Property exchange contracts must be made in writing, notarized, authenticated or registered, if so required by law.

3. Where one party exchanges property to the other party does not belong to its ownership or is not authorized by the owner, the other party has the right to cancel the contract and claim damages.

4. Each party shall be deemed to be the seller of the delivered property. to the other party and to be the buyer of the property received. property exchange.
Bộ luật dân sự@456:
Payment of the difference value

In the case of an exchange of assets with a difference in value, the parties must pay each other for such difference, unless otherwise agreed upon or provided for by law. otherwise.
Bộ luật dân sự@457:
Property donation contract

Property donation contract is an agreement between parties whereby the donor hands over its property and transfers ownership rights to the donor without claim, the donor agrees to receive.
Bộ luật dân sự@458:
Giving to movable property

1. A contract for donation of movables takes effect from the time the donor receives the property, unless otherwise agreed.

2. For In the case of movable property which the law provides for registration of ownership rights, the donation contract shall take effect from the time of registration.
Bộ luật dân sự@459:
A gift to real estate

1. A gift of real estate must be made in writing, notarized, authenticated or registered, if the real property is subject to registration of ownership according to regulations. of law.

2. The contract for gifting real estate takes effect from the time of registration; if the property is not subject to registration of ownership, the donation contract takes effect from the time of transfer. asset.
Bộ luật dân sự@460:
Liability due to intentional donation of property not owned by the donor

In case the donor intentionally donates property that is not under his/her ownership without the knowledge or ability of the donor If the donor knows about it, the donor must pay expenses to increase the value of the property for the donor when the owner takes back the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@461:
Notification of defects of donated property

The donor is obliged to notify the recipient of the defect of the donated property. In case the donor indicates that the property has defects, If the donor fails to notify, he/she shall be responsible for compensating for damage caused to the recipient; if the donor is unaware of the defect of the donated property, he/she shall not be liable for compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@462:
Conditional donation of property

1. The donor may require the grantee to perform one or more obligations before or after the donation. The donation conditions must not be violated. prohibited by law, not contrary to social morality.

2. In case of performing an obligation before giving, if the donor has fulfilled the obligation but the donor does not hand over the property, the donor will The donor must pay an obligation that the donor has performed .

3. In case an obligation has to be performed after the donation but the donor fails to perform, the donor has the right to reclaim the property and claim for damages.
Bộ luật dân sự@463:
Property loan contract

Property loan contract is an agreement between parties whereby the lender delivers the property to the borrower; when due, the borrower must return it to the borrower. lending properties of the same type according to the correct quantity and quality and only paying interest if so agreed or prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@464:
Ownership over the loan asset

The borrower becomes the owner of the borrowed asset from the time of receipt of the asset.
Bộ luật dân sự@465:
Obligation of the lender

1. Deliver the property to the borrower in full, in the right quality and quantity at the agreed time and place.

2. Compensation for damage to the borrower, if the lender knows that the property is not of good quality without notifying the borrower, unless the borrower knows and still accepts the property.

3. Do not ask the borrower to return the property. property ahead of time, unless otherwise provided for in Article 470 of this Code or other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@466:
The borrower's debt repayment obligation

1. The borrower whose property is money must pay in full when due; if the property is an object, it must return the object of the same type in the correct quantity and quality, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the borrower is unable to repay the object, it may pay in cash according to the value of the borrowed object at the place and time of repayment, if agreed by the lender. .

3. The place of repayment is the place of residence or the place of the head office of the lender, unless otherwise agreed.

4. In case the loan does not have interest but when due, the borrower does not If the debt is paid or not fully paid, the lender has the right to demand interest payment at the interest rate specified in Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code on the amount of late payment corresponding to the late payment period, except for the following cases: otherwise agreed or otherwise provided for by law.

5. In case a loan has interest but when due, the borrower does not pay or does not pay it in full, the borrower must pay interest as follows:

a) Interest on the principal at the interest rate agreed upon in the contract corresponding to the loan term but not yet paid; In case of late payment, interest must also be paid at the rate specified in Clause 2, Article 468 of this Code;

b) Interest on overdue principal that has not yet been paid is equal to 150% of the contractual loan interest rate corresponding to late payment period, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@467:
Use of borrowed property

The parties can agree that the borrowed property must be used for the right purpose of the loan. The lender has the right to inspect the use of the property and has the right to reclaim it. Borrowed assets before the due date if the borrower still uses the property against the purpose despite reminding.
Bộ luật dân sự@468:
Interest

1. Loan interest rate agreed by the parties.

In case the parties agree on the interest rate, the agreed interest rate must not exceed 20%/year of the loan amount. Based on the actual situation and at the proposal of the Government, the National Assembly Standing Committee shall decide to adjust the aforesaid interest rate and report to the National Assembly at the nearest meeting.

In case the agreed interest rate exceeds the limit interest rate specified in this Clause, the excess interest rate will not take effect.

2. Unless otherwise agreed by the parties on the payment of interest, but the interest rate is not specified and there is a dispute over the interest rate, the interest rate shall be determined at 50% of the limit interest rate specified in Clause 1 of this Article at the time of debt repayment.
Bộ luật dân sự@469:
Perform a demand loan contract

1. For a demand loan contract with no interest, the lender has the right to reclaim the property and the borrower also has the right to repay the loan at any time. at any time, but must notify each other in advance a reasonable time, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In the case of a loan contract with a demand and interest, the lender has the right to reclaim the loan. property at any time, but must give the borrower a reasonable period of advance notice and be paid interest up to the time of the return of the property, and the borrower also has the right to return the property at any time and to pay interest only to the to the time of repayment, but must also give the lender a reasonable time in advance.
Bộ luật dân sự@470:
Performing a term loan contract

1. For a term loan contract with no interest, the borrower has the right to return the property at any time, but must notify the other party in advance. loan for a reasonable period of time, while the lender is only entitled to reclaim the property before the maturity date, if agreed to by the borrower.

2. For a loan with a term and interest, the borrower has the right to return the property before the maturity date, but must pay the full interest according to the term, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@471:
Ho, hui, bieu, ward

1. Surname, hui, bieu, ward (hereinafter collectively referred to as surname) is a customary form of property transaction on the basis of an agreement between a a group of people gathered together to determine the number of people, time, money or other property, the mode of contribution and receipt and the rights and obligations of the members.

2. The organization of them is for the purpose Mutual assistance among the people shall comply with the provisions of law.

3. In case their organization is profitable, the interest rate must comply with the provisions of this Code.

4. It is strictly forbidden to organize them in the form of usury.
Bộ luật dân sự@472:
Property lease contract

Property lease contract is an agreement between parties whereby the lessor delivers the property to the lessee for use for a period of time, the lessee must pay money lease.

Household lease contracts, house lease contracts for other purposes shall comply with the provisions of this Code, the Housing Law and other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@473:
Rental price

1. Rent shall be agreed upon by the parties or determined by a third party at the request of the parties, unless otherwise provided for by law.

2. Otherwise If there is an agreement or the agreement is not clear, the rental price is determined according to the market price at the place and time of signing the lease contract.
Bộ luật dân sự@474:
Leasing term

1. The lease term shall be agreed upon by the parties; if there is no agreement, it shall be determined according to the rental purpose.

2. In case the parties do not agree on the lease term, the lease term shall be determined according to the rental purpose. the lease term and the lease term cannot be determined according to the purpose of the lease, each party has the right to terminate the contract at any time, but must notify the other party in advance a reasonable time.
Bộ luật dân sự@475:
Sublease

The lessee has the right to sublease the property it has rented, if the lessor agrees.
Bộ luật dân sự@476:
Delivering the leased asset

1. The lessor must deliver the property to the lessee in the correct quantity, quality, type, condition, time and place as agreed upon and provide information necessary for the use of such property.

2. In case the lessor is late in delivering the property, the lessee may extend the time to deliver the property or cancel the contract and claim compensation for damage; if the property If the lessee does not meet the agreed quality, the lessee has the right to request the lessor to repair, reduce the rental price or cancel the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@477:
Obligation to guarantee the use value of the leased asset

1. The lessor must ensure that the leased property is in the agreed condition, suitable for the rental purpose during the lease term . The lessee must repair the damage or defects of the leased property, except for minor damage which, according to the lessee's custom, must be repaired by himself.

2. In case the leased asset is reduced in use value without due to the fault of the lessee, the lessee has the right to request the lessor to take one or more of the following measures:

a) Repair the property;

b) Reduce the rental price;

c) Change the property or unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and claim for damages, if the leased property has defects that are not known to the lessee or the leased property cannot be repaired and thus the rental purpose is not achieved. yes.

3. In case the lessor has been notified but fails to repair or repair it in time, the lessee has the right to repair the leased property by himself at a reasonable cost, but must notify the lessor. and has the right to request the lessor to pay repair costs.
Bộ luật dân sự@478:
Obligation to secure the right to use the property for the lessee

1. The lessor must ensure a stable right to use the property for the lessee.

2. In the event of a dispute about If the lessee is not allowed to use the property in a stable manner, the lessee has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@479:
Obligation to preserve the leased property

1. The lessee must preserve the leased property, maintain it and make minor repairs; if it is lost or damaged, it must pay compensation.

The lessee. is not responsible for natural wear and tear caused by the use of the leased asset.

2. The lessee may repair and increase the value of the leased property, if agreed to by the lessor and has the right to demand the lessee. reasonable rental fee payment.
Bộ luật dân sự@480:
Obligation to use the leased asset for the right use and purpose

1. The lessee must use the leased asset in accordance with its intended use and for the agreed purpose.

2 Where the lessee uses the property for improper purposes or for improper use, the lessor has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@481:
Pay rent

1. The lessee must pay the rent in full within the agreed time limit; if there is no agreement on the rental payment term, the rental payment term is determined by custom. the place of payment; if the customary term cannot be determined, the lessee must pay when returning the leased property.

2. If the parties agree on the payment of rent by term, the lessor shall pay the rent. has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract, if the lessee fails to pay for three consecutive periods, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@482:
Returning the leased property

1. The lessee must return the leased property in the same condition as when received, minus natural wear and tear or in the agreed condition; if the value of the property is The lessor has the right to claim compensation for damage, except for natural wear and tear.

In case the leased property is cattle, the lessee must return the rented cattle and also the livestock born. during the lease period, unless otherwise agreed. has the right to request the lessee to return the leased property, to pay the rent during the late payment period and to pay compensation for damage; the lessee must pay a fine for late payment of the leased property, if so agreed.

Bộ luật dân sự@494:
Property loan contract

Property loan contract is an agreement between parties whereby the lender delivers the property to the borrower for use for a period of time without having to pay, the borrower must return the property when the loan term expires or the borrowing purpose has been achieved.
Bộ luật dân sự@495:
Object of a loan agreement

All non-consumable assets can be the subject of a loan agreement.
Bộ luật dân sự@496:
Obligation of the borrower

1. To keep and preserve the borrowed property, not to arbitrarily change the condition of the property; if the property is damaged normally, it must be repaired. .

2. Do not lend the property back to other people, without the consent of the lender.

3. Return the borrowed property on time; if there is no agreement on the time limit for returning the property. the borrower must return the property immediately after the borrowing purpose has been achieved.

4. Compensation for damage, if lost or damaged.

5. The borrower must bear risk to the borrowed property during the period of late payment.
Bộ luật dân sự@497:
Right of the borrower

1. To use the borrowed property in accordance with the intended use of the property and for the agreed purpose.

2. To request the lessor to pay the expenses. reasonable fee for repair or increase in value of borrowed property, if agreed.

3. Not liable for natural wear and tear of borrowed property.
Bộ luật dân sự@498:
Obligation of the property lender

1. Provide necessary information about the use of the property and its defects, if any.

2. Pay the borrower repair costs, expenses that increase the value of the property, if there is an agreement.

3. Compensation for damage to the borrower if the borrower knows that the property has defects but fails to notify the borrower, leading to damage. to the borrower, except for defects known or ought to be known by the borrower.
Bộ luật dân sự@499:
The right of the property lender

1. To reclaim the property immediately after the borrower achieves the purpose if there is no agreement on the loan term; if the lender has an unexpected need and If the borrower urgently needs to use the loaned property, he/she may reclaim such property even though the borrower has not yet achieved the purpose, but must give reasonable notice in advance.

2. Claim the property back when the borrower uses it. improper purposes, uses, improper methods as agreed or lent to another person without the consent of the lender.

3. Claim for damage to the property by the borrower cause.
Bộ luật dân sự@500:
Land use right contract

Land use right contract is an agreement between parties whereby a land user converts, transfers, leases, subleases, donates give, mortgage, contribute land use rights as capital or exercise other rights under the Land Law to the other party; the other party performs the rights and obligations under the contract with the land user.
Bộ luật dân sự@501:
Content of contract on land use rights

1. General provisions on contract and content of relevant common contract in this Code also apply to contract on land use right. land use rights, unless otherwise provided for by law.

2. The contents of a contract on land use rights must not contravene regulations on land use purposes, land use term, planning, land use plan and other rights and obligations as prescribed by the land law and other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@502:
Form and procedures for performance of a contract on land use rights

1. A contract on land use rights must be made in writing in a form consistent with the provisions of this Code, the land law and other relevant laws.

2. The performance of a contract on land use rights must comply with the order and procedures prescribed by the land law and regulations. other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@503:
Effect of land use right transfer

Land use right transfer takes effect from the time of registration in accordance with the Land Law.
Bộ luật dân sự@504:
Cooperation contract

1. A cooperation contract is an agreement between individuals and legal entities to jointly contribute assets and efforts to perform certain tasks and benefit together. and are jointly responsible.

2. The cooperation contract must be in writing.
Bộ luật dân sự@506:
Common property of cooperative members

1. Property contributed and jointly created by members and other property as prescribed by law is common property according to the share of members. co-operative members.

In case there is an agreement on money contribution, but the cooperation member is late, he/she shall be responsible for paying interest on the late payment amount as prescribed in Article 357 of this Code and must pay compensation. damage.

2. The disposition of property which is the right to use land, house, workshop and other means of production must be agreed in writing by all members; the disposition of other property decided by representatives of the members, unless otherwise agreed.

3. Common property may not be divided before terminating the cooperation contract, unless all cooperative members have agreement.

The division of common property specified in this Clause does not change or terminate the rights and obligations established and performed before the time the property is divided.
Bộ luật dân sự@507:
Rights and obligations of cooperative members

1. To enjoy the benefits and profits earned from cooperative activities.

2. Participate in deciding on issues related to the implementation of the cooperative activities. execute cooperation contracts, supervise cooperation activities.

3. Compensation for damage to other cooperative members caused by their own faults.

4. Perform other rights and obligations under the contract copper.
Bộ luật dân sự@508:
Establishing and performing civil transactions

1. In case the cooperative members appoint a representative, this person shall be the representative in establishing and performing civil transactions.
 
2. If the cooperative members do not appoint a representative, the cooperative members must jointly establish and perform civil transactions, unless otherwise agreed.

3. civil services established and performed by the subjects specified in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article, giving rise to the rights and obligations of all cooperative members.
Bộ luật dân sự@509:
Civil liability of cooperative members

Cooperative members shall bear common civil liability by common property; if the common property is not enough to perform the common obligation, the cooperative member shall shall be liable with their own property in proportion to their contribution, unless otherwise provided for by the cooperation contract or by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@510:
Withdraw from the cooperation contract

1. A member has the right to withdraw from the cooperation contract in the following cases:

a) According to the conditions agreed in the cooperation contract;

b) Having a good reason and with the consent of more than half of the total number of cooperative members.

2. A member withdrawing from the cooperation contract has the right to claim back the contributed assets, may share property in the common property and have to pay obligations as agreed. .

The withdrawal from the cooperation contract does not terminate the rights and obligations of this person established and performed before the time of withdrawal from the cooperation contract.

3. The withdrawal from the cooperation contract If the member does not fall into the case specified in Clause 1 of this Article, the member who withdraws from the contract shall be identified as the party in breach of the contract and shall have to perform civil liability in accordance with the provisions of this Code and other relevant laws.
Bộ luật dân sự@511:
Joining a cooperation contract

Where the cooperation contract does not stipulate otherwise, an individual or legal entity becomes a new member of the contract if more than half of the total consent is obtained. cooperative members.
Bộ luật dân sự@513:
Service contract

Service contract is an agreement between parties whereby the service provider performs work for the service user, the service user must pay money service to the service provider.
Bộ luật dân sự@514:
The object of the service contract

The object of the service contract is the work that can be done, does not violate the prohibition of the law, does not violate social ethics.
Bộ luật dân sự@515:
Obligation of the service user

1. To provide the service provider with information, documents and necessary facilities to perform the work, if there is an agreement or performance perform the required work.

2. Pay for the service to the service provider as agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@516:
Rights of the service user

1. To request the service provider to perform the work in accordance with the quality, quantity, time limit, location and other agreement.

2 . In case the service provider seriously violates the obligations, the service user has the right to unilaterally terminate the contract performance and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@517:
Obligation of the service provider

1. To perform the work in accordance with the quality, quantity, deadline, location and other agreement.

2. Not to be assigned to others perform the work on behalf of the service user without the consent of the service user.

3. Preserve and return the assigned documents and means to the service user after completing the work.

4. Immediately notify the service user about the incomplete information, documents, and unsatisfactory means to complete the work.

5. Keep the information that you know confidential. during the performance of the job, if so agreed or prescribed by law.

6. Compensate the service user for damage, if he/she loses or damages documents or vehicles delivered or saves money. reveal confidential information.
Bộ luật dân sự@518:
Rights of the service provider

1. To request the service user to provide information, documents and means to perform the work.

2. To change the conditions service for the benefit of the service user without necessarily waiting for the service user's opinion, if waiting for an opinion will cause damage to the service user, but must immediately notify the user service.

3. Ask the service user to pay for the service.
Bộ luật dân sự@519:
Paying for the service

1. The service user must pay for the service as agreed.

2. When entering into a contract, if there is no agreement on the service price, the method service price determination method and without any other instructions on service price, the service price is determined based on the market price of services of the same type at the time and place of entering into the contract.
 
3. The service user must pay for the service at the job site upon completion of the service, unless otherwise agreed.

4. In case the service provided is not as satisfactory as the service provided. agreement or the work is not completed on time, the service user has the right to reduce the service fee and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@520:
To unilaterally terminate the performance of the service contract

1. In case the continuation of the work is not beneficial to the service user, the service user has the right to unilaterally terminate the service contract. perform the contract, but must notify the service provider in advance a reasonable time; the service user must pay wages according to the part of the service that the service provider has performed and compensate for damage. 

2. In case the service user seriously violates the obligations, the service provider has the right to unilaterally terminate the contract performance and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@521:
Continuing the service contract

After the end of the term of performance of the work under the service contract, but the work has not been completed and the service provider continues to perform the work, the party If the service user knows but does not object, the service contract will automatically continue to perform according to the agreed content until the work is completed.
Bộ luật dân sự@522:
Contract for the carriage of passengers
