A contract of carriage of passengers is an agreement between the parties whereby the carrier transports passengers and/or luggage to the agreed destination. The customer must pay the shipping fee.
Bộ luật dân sự@523:
Form of contract of carriage of passengers

1. A contract of carriage of passengers can be made in writing, orally or established by specific acts.

2. The ticket is proof of the conclusion of the contract of carriage of passengers between the parties.
Bộ luật dân sự@524:
Obligation of the carrier

1. To carry passengers from the place of origin to the right place, to the right place, on time, by the agreed means of transport safely, according to the route; ensure enough room for passengers and do not carry more than the tonnage.

2. Buy civil liability insurance for passengers in accordance with the law.

3. Make sure the departure time has been completed. notified or agreed.

4. Carry the baggage and return it to the passenger or person entitled to receive it at the agreed place at the agreed time and route.

5. Return to passengers the freight as agreed or prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@526:
Passenger's obligations

1. Pay in full the freight for the carriage of the passenger, the freight for the excess baggage and take care of the carry-on baggage.

2. Be present at the starting point at the agreed time.

3. Respect and strictly abide by the regulations of the carrier and other regulations on ensuring traffic safety.
Bộ luật dân sự@527:
Passenger's rights

1. Request to be transported by the correct means of transport and the value of the freight according to the agreed route.

2. Free freight carriage for checked baggage and hand baggage within the limits agreed upon or prescribed by law.

3. Claim payment of incurred costs or compensation for damage, if the carrier has failure to deliver the goods on time and to the agreed place .

4. Get back all or part of the freight in the case specified at Points b and c, Clause 2, Article 525 of the Code of the Code. this and other cases prescribed by law or as agreed.

5. Pick up baggage at the agreed place according to the agreed time and route.

6. Request to stop the journey for a period of time. time and in accordance with the procedures prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@528:
Liability to compensate for damage

1. In case the life, health and luggage of a passenger is damaged, the carrier must compensate in accordance with the law.

2 The carrier is not required to compensate for damage to the life, health and luggage of the passenger if the damage is caused entirely by the fault of the passenger, unless otherwise provided for by law.

3. In case a passenger violates the agreed carriage conditions and regulations of the carriage, causing damage to the carrier or a third person, he/she must pay compensation.
Bộ luật dân sự@529:
Unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract of carriage of passengers

1. The carrier has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract in the case specified in Clause 2, Article 525 of this Code. 

2. The passenger has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract in case the carrier violates the obligations specified in Clauses 1, 3 and 4, Article 524 of this Code.

Subsection 2. 

PROPERTY TRANSPORTATION CONTRACT
Bộ luật dân sự@530:
Contract for the carriage of property

A contract for the carriage of property is an agreement between the parties whereby the carrier is obliged to deliver the property to the agreed destination and deliver the property. such property to the person entitled to receive it, the shipping hirer is obliged to pay the freight.
Bộ luật dân sự@531:
Form of contract of carriage of property

1. A contract of carriage of property is concluded in writing, orally or established by specific acts.

2. Transport invoice or other equivalent transport document is evidence of the conclusion of the contract between the parties.
Bộ luật dân sự@532:
Delivering the property to the carrier

1. The lessee is obliged to deliver the property to the carrier on time, at the place and pack it in accordance with the agreed specifications; to bear expenses for loading and unloading the property onto the means of transport, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the lessee fails to deliver the property on time and at the agreed place, it must pay the expenses . the cost of waiting and the money to transport the property to the place agreed in the contract to the carrier.

If the carrier is late to receive the property at the agreed place, it must bear the costs incurred due to slow reception.
Bộ luật dân sự@533:
Transportation charges

1. The freight rates shall be agreed upon by the parties; if the law prescribes the freight rates, such freight rates shall apply.

2. The shipping hirer must pay the full freight after the property is loaded onto the means of transport, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@534:
Obligation of the carrier

1. Ensure the complete and safe transportation of the property to the specified destination, on time.

2. Deliver the property to the person with the right receive.

3. Bear costs related to the transportation of property, unless otherwise agreed.

4. Buy civil liability insurance in accordance with the law.

5 . Compensate for damage to the transport hirer in case the carrier loses or damages the property, unless otherwise agreed upon or otherwise provided by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@535:
Shipper's rights

1. Check the authenticity of the property, bill of lading or other equivalent shipping document.

2. Refuse to transport property that is not in accordance with type of property as agreed in the contract.

3. To request the transport hirer to pay the freight in full on time.

4. Refuse to transport the prohibited property, the property dangerous or harmful nature, if the carrier knew or ought to know.
Bộ luật dân sự@536:
Obligations of the shipping hirer

1. Pay the carrier in full for the freight on time and by the agreed method.

2. Provide necessary information related to the transported property to ensure the safety of the transported property.

3. Look after the property in transit, if so agreed. If it is lost or damaged, it will not be compensated.
Bộ luật dân sự@537:
Rights of the lessee

1. To request the carrier to transport the property to the right place and at the agreed time.

2. Directly or appoint a third person to receive the property. return the rented property.
Bộ luật dân sự@538:
Delivering the property to the receiver

1. The receiver of the property may be the lessee or the third person designated by the lessee to receive the property.

2. The carrier must deliver the property in full, on time and at the agreed place to the receiver.

3. In case the property has been delivered to the place of delivery on time but has not been delivered. If there is a receiver of the property, the carrier may deposit such property at the place of delivery and must immediately notify the lessee or a third person designated by the carrier to receive the property. a third party designated by the carriage to receive the property shall bear reasonable costs arising from the deposit.

The obligation to deliver the property is fulfilled when the property has been deposited and the lessee transports it. or a third person designated by the charterer to receive the property has been notified of custody.
Bộ luật dân sự@539:
Obligation of the receiver of the property

1. Present to the carrier a bill of lading or other equivalent transport document and receive the property on time and at the agreed place.

2. Bear the costs of loading and unloading the transported property, unless otherwise agreed upon or otherwise provided by law.

3. Pay reasonable expenses arising from the delay in receiving the property.

4. In case the receiver of the property is a third person appointed by the shipping charterer, it must notify the shipping charterer of the receipt of the property and other necessary information at the request of the shipping charterer.
Bộ luật dân sự@540:
Rights of the recipient of the property

1. Check the quantity and quality of the delivered property.

2. Receive the delivered property.

3. Request the carrier shall pay reasonable costs incurred due to waiting to receive the property if the carrier is late in delivering it.

4. Request the carrier to compensate for damage caused by the loss or damage of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@541:
Liability to compensate for damage

1. The carrier must compensate the carrier for damage if the property is lost or damaged, except for the case specified in Clause 3, Article 536 of this Law. This Code.

2. The transport hirer must compensate the carrier and the third party for damage caused by the transport of dangerous or toxic properties without packing measures, ensure safety during transportation.

3. In case of force majeure, the transport property is lost, damaged or destroyed during transportation, the carrier is not responsible for compensation. damage, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@542:
Processing contract

Processing contract is an agreement between parties, whereby the processor performs work to create products at the request of the processor, the ordering party. outsourcing products and paying wages.
Bộ luật dân sự@543:
The subject matter of the processing contract

The object of the processing contract is an object predefined according to the form, according to the standard agreed upon by the parties or prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@544:
Obligation of the processing party

1. To supply raw materials in accordance with the agreed quantity, quality, deadline and location to the processor; provide necessary documents related to the processing.

2. Instruct the processor to perform the contract.

3. Pay wages as agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@545:
Right of the ordering party

1. To receive processed products according to the agreed quantity, quality, method, time limit and place.

2. Unilateral termination perform the contract and demand compensation for damage when the processor seriously violates the contract.

3. In case the product does not meet the quality standards, the processing party agrees to receive the product and request repair but cannot be repaired by the processor within the agreed time limit, the processor has the right to cancel the contract and demand compensation for damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@546:
Obligation of the processor

1. Preserve the materials provided by the supplier.

2. Notify the supplier to exchange for other materials, if raw materials are not of good quality; refuse to perform processing, if they know or must know that the use of materials can create products that are dangerous to society.

3. Deliver products to the ordering party. processing in accordance with the agreed quantity, quality, method, deadline and location.

4. Keep confidential information about the processing process and the resulting product.

5. Take responsibility about product quality, unless the product does not meet the quality requirements due to the raw materials provided by the processing party or due to unreasonable instructions of the processing party.

6. Return of materials. the remaining data to the outsourcing party after the contract is completed.
Bộ luật dân sự@547:
Rights of the processor

1. To request the ordering party to deliver materials with the right quality, quantity, time and place as agreed upon.

2. Refuse the unreasonable instructions of the contractor during the performance of the contract, if it is found that such instructions may reduce the quality of the product, it must be immediately reported to the supplier.

3. Request the party outsourced to pay full wages according to the agreed time and method.
Bộ luật dân sự@548:
Responsibility for risk

Until the product is delivered to the ordering party, the party who is the owner of the material bears the risk of the material or product created from such materials, unless otherwise agreed.

When the ordering party is late to receive the product, it bears the risk during the period of delay, even if the product is made from raw materials. materials of the processing party, unless otherwise agreed.

When the processing party delays in delivering the products and has risks to the processed products, they must compensate for the damage caused to the ordering party. labour.
Bộ luật dân sự@549:
Delivery and receipt of processed products

The process receiving party must deliver the products and the ordering party must receive the products on time and at the agreed place.
Bộ luật dân sự@550:
Delay in delivery, late receipt of processed products

1. In case the processor is slow to deliver the product, the processor may extend an extension; if such time limit expires, the processor still If the work has not been completed, the processing party has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract and demand compensation for damage.

2. In case the processing party is late to receive the products, the processor may send such products at the place of receipt and keep and must immediately notify the processing party. bear all costs arising from the deposit.
Bộ luật dân sự@551:
Unilaterally terminate the performance of the processing contract

1. Each party has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the processing contract, if the continuation of the performance of the contract does not bring benefits to the other party. unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided by law, but must notify the other party in advance a reasonable time.

2. The outsourcing party unilaterally terminates the contract performance must pay wages corresponding to the work performed, unless otherwise agreed. . The party that unilaterally terminates the performance of the contract and causes damage to the other party must compensate.
Bộ luật dân sự@552:
Payment of wages

1. The processing party must pay in full at the time of receiving the products, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case there is no agreement on the level of payment, wages shall apply the average wage for the creation of products of the same type at the processing site and at the time of payment.

3. The outsourcing party has no right to reduce wages, if the product is does not guarantee the quality due to the materials that I have provided or because of my unreasonable instructions.
Bộ luật dân sự@553:
Liquidation of materials

When the processing contract terminates, the processor must return the remaining materials to the processor, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@554:
Contract on deposit of property

A contract of custody of property is an agreement between parties whereby the custodian receives the depositor's property for preservation and returns the property itself to the party. When the term of the contract expires, the sender must pay wages to the keeper, except for the case of deposit without payment.
Bộ luật dân sự@555:
Obligation of the depositor

1. When handing over the property, it must immediately notify the custodian of the condition of the property and take appropriate measures to preserve the deposited property; otherwise, If the deposited property is destroyed or damaged due to not being properly preserved, the depositor must bear it; if causing damage, he/she must compensate.

2. Payment must be made in full, on time and in the right manner. agreed manner.
Bộ luật dân sự@556:
Rights of the depositor

1. To request the return of the property at any time, if the depository contract does not specify a term, but must give the custodian a reasonable time in advance .

2. Claim compensation, if the custodian loses or damages the deposited property, except for force majeure.
Bộ luật dân sự@557:
Obligation of the property holder

1. Preserve the property in accordance with the agreement, return the property to the sender in the same condition as when it was received.

2. Only change change the way of preserving the property if the change is necessary to better preserve the property, but immediately notify the sender of the change.

3. Promptly notify the sender of the danger chance of damage or destruction of property due to the nature of such property and request the sender to know how to deal with it within a period of time; if after that time limit, the sender does not reply, the holder has the right to take measures. necessary measures to preserve it and request the sender to pay the expenses.

4. Must compensate for any loss or damage to the deposited property, except in the event of force majeure.
Bộ luật dân sự@558:
Rights of the property holder

1. To require the sender to pay remuneration as agreed upon.

2. To require the sender to pay reasonable costs to preserve the property in the case of deposit without payment.

3. To request the sender to receive the property at any time, but to give the sender a reasonable time in advance in the case of indefinite custody.

4 Sell the property in custody which is in danger of being damaged or destroyed in order to ensure the interests of the sender, notify the depositor of that fact and pay the depositor the proceeds from the sale of the property, after deducting legal expenses. reason to sell the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@559:
Returning the deposited property

1. The custodian must return the property received and yield if any, unless otherwise agreed.

Place of return of the deposited property. custodian is the place of deposit; if the sender requests to return the property to another place, it shall bear the costs of transporting it to that place, unless otherwise agreed.

2. The keeper must return the property on time. term and only have the right to request the sender to take back the property before the time limit, if there is a good reason.
Bộ luật dân sự@560:
Delayed delivery or receipt of the deposited property

In case the custodian is late to deliver the property, the depositor shall not be required to pay wages and pay the costs of preservation, from the time of delay. In case the sender is late to receive the property and must bear the risks for the property during the delay. delay time to receive.
Bộ luật dân sự@561:
Payment of wages

1. The sender must pay the full remuneration when taking back the deposited property, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the parties do not agree on the amount remuneration, the average wage rate at the place and time of payment of remuneration shall be applied.

3. When the sender recovers the property ahead of time, it must still pay the wages in full and pay the necessary expenses for development. arising from the fact that the custodian must return the property before the due date, unless otherwise agreed.

4. When the custodian requests the depositor to recover the property before the time limit, the custodian shall not receive remuneration and must compensate the sender for damage, unless otherwise agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@562:
Authorized contract

Authorized contract is an agreement between parties whereby the authorized party is obliged to perform work on behalf of the principal, the principal only has to take revenge labor if so agreed or provided for by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@563:
Authorization duration

Authorization term shall be agreed upon by the parties or prescribed by law; if there is no agreement and there is no law, the authorization contract is valid for 1 year , from the date of establishment of the authorization.
Bộ luật dân sự@564:
Re-authorization

1. The authorized party may re-authorize another person in the following cases:

a) With the consent of the authorizing party;

b) In case of force majeure events, if re-authorization is not applied, the purpose of establishing and performing civil transactions for the benefit of the principal cannot be realized.

2. The re-authorization must not exceed scope of original authorization.

3. The form of the re-authorization contract must be consistent with the original form of authorization.
Bộ luật dân sự@565:
Obligation of the authorized party

1. Perform the work as authorized and notify the authorizing party of the performance of such work.

2. Notify a third party in the authority system for performing authorization on the time limit, scope of authorization and the modification and supplementation of the scope of authorization.

3. Preserve and preserve documents and means assigned to perform the authorization.

4. Keep confidential the information that you know while performing the authorization.

5. Return to the principal the property received and the benefits obtained during the performance of the authorization under the authorization. agreement or as prescribed by law.

6. To compensate for damage caused by breach of obligations specified in this Article.
Bộ luật dân sự@566:
Authorized party's rights

1. To request the authorizing party to provide necessary information, documents and means to perform the authorized work.

2. Get paid for reasonable fees that I have paid to perform the authorized work; receive remuneration, if so agreed.
Bộ luật dân sự@567:
Obligation of the authorizing party

1. Provide necessary information, documents and means for the authorized party to perform the work.

2. Be responsible for the commitments made by the authorized party. the authorized party to perform within the scope of authorization.

3. Pay reasonable expenses incurred by the authorized party to perform the authorized work; pay remuneration to the authorized party, if there is an agreement on the payment of remuneration.
Bộ luật dân sự@568:
Authorizing party's rights

1. To request the authorized party to give full notice of the performance of the authorization work.

2. To request the authorized party to hand over the property, benefits derived from the performance of the authorized work, unless otherwise agreed.

3. To be compensated for damage, if the authorized party violates the obligations specified in Article 565 of this Code .
Bộ luật dân sự@569:
Unilateral termination of performance of the authorization contract

1. In case of authorization with remuneration, the principal has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract at any time, but must retaliate remuneration to the authorized party in proportion to the work performed by the authorized party and to compensate the damage; if the mandate does not provide remuneration, the principal may terminate the performance of the contract at any time, but must notify the principal a reasonable time in advance.

The principal must notify the third party in writing of the termination of the performance of the contract by the mandator; if not, the contract shall be signed with the principal. the third party is still in effect, unless the third party knows or ought to know that the authorization contract has been terminated.

2. In the case of an authorization without remuneration, the authorized party has the right to unilateral terminate the performance of the contract at any time, but must notify the principal a reasonable time in advance; if the authorization is paid, the authorized party has the right to unilaterally terminate the performance of the contract at any time and must compensate the authorizing party for damage, if any.
Bộ luật dân sự@570:
Promise of reward

1. The person who has publicly promised the reward must pay the reward to the person who has performed the work at the request of the promiser.

2. The promised work must be specific, can be done, not violating the prohibition of the law, not contrary to social morality.
Bộ luật dân sự@571:
Withdrawal of promise statement

When it is not yet due to start work, the promiser has the right to withdraw his promise statement. Withdrawal of promise statement must be done in the manner and by the means by which the promise of reward has been announced.
Bộ luật dân sự@572:
Remuneration

1. Where a job is promised a reward performed by a person, when the job is completed, the person performing the work is rewarded.

2. When a job is completed, the person performing the work is rewarded.

2. the promised reward is done by many people, but each person does it independently, the first person to complete the reward will receive the reward.

3. In case more than one person completes the promised job at the same time. points, the reward will be divided equally among those people.

4. In case many people collaborate to perform the promised work requested by the reward promiseer, each person will receive a portion of the corresponding reward. with your contribution.
Bộ luật dân sự@573:
The contest has prizes

1. The organization of cultural, artistic, sports, scientific, technical and other competitions must not violate the prohibition of the law, nor be contrary to morality. social ethics.

2. Contest organizers must announce the competition conditions, points scale, prizes and prize levels of each prize.

A change of competition conditions must be made in the manner announced within a reasonable period of time prior to the contest.

3. The winner has the right to demand that the contest organizers award the prize in accordance with the announced amount.
Bộ luật dân sự@574:
Performing work without authorization

Performing work without authorization is when a person has no obligation to perform a job but voluntarily does it for the benefit of another person. there's work to be done when this person doesn't know or knows without objecting.
Bộ luật dân sự@575:
Obligation to perform work without authorization

1. Persons performing work without authorization are obliged to perform work in accordance with their abilities and conditions.

2. The person performing the work without authorization must perform the work as if it were his/her own job; if the person who has the job knows or guesses the intention of the person having the job, he/she must perform the work in accordance with that intention.

3. The person performing the work without authorization must notify the person having the job performed about the process and results of the job performance if so requested, except for the case where the person having the job is known or the person performing the work. perform the work without authorization without knowing his or her place of residence or headquarters.

4. If the person whose work is performed dies, if it is an individual or ceases to exist, if it is a legal entity, the person performing the work without authorization must continue to perform the work until the heir or the representative of the person whose work is performed has accepted.

5. Where there is a good reason If the person performing the work without authorization is unable to continue to perform the work, he/she must notify the person whose work is performed, his/her representative or relative, or may ask another person to do the work on his/her behalf. performance of the job.
Bộ luật dân sự@576:
Payment obligation of the person whose work is performed

1. The person whose work is performed must take over the work when the person performing the work does not have authorization to hand over the work and pay pay reasonable expenses incurred by the person performing the work without authorization to perform the work, even if the work does not achieve the desired result.

2. The person with meritorious services the work performed must pay the person performing the work without authorization a remuneration when this person performs the work in his or her own interest, unless the person performing the work without authorization refuses.
Bộ luật dân sự@577:
Obligation to compensate for damage

1. When a person performing work without authorization intentionally causes damage while performing a job, he/she must compensate the person whose work is performed. perform.

2. If the person performing the work without authorization unintentionally causes damage while performing the work, depending on the circumstances of undertaking the work, that person may be entitled to a reduction in the amount of compensation. .
Bộ luật dân sự@579:
Obligation to return

1. A person possessing or using another person's property without a legal basis must return it to the owner or holder of other rights to the property. such property; if the owner or holder of other rights to the property cannot be found, it must be handed over to a competent state agency, except for the case specified in Article 236 of this Code.

2. Persons who benefit from property without a legal basis to cause damage to others must return such profits to the damage sufferers, except for the case specified in Article 236 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@580:
Returned property

1. The person possessing or using the property without legal grounds must return the entire property obtained.

2. Case of property If the returned property is a specific object, it must be returned exactly that object; if that particular object is lost or damaged, it must be compensated in cash, unless otherwise agreed.

3. In case the property is returned If an object is of the same type, but is lost or damaged, the object of the same type must be returned or compensated in cash, unless otherwise agreed.

4. The person who benefits from the property without a legal basis must return the profit on that property to the damage sufferer in kind or in money.
Bộ luật dân sự@581:
Obligation to return yields and profits

1. Owners, users of property, and those who benefit from property without legal grounds and in good faith must return them. yields, profits earned from the time of possession and use of property, and benefits from property without a legal basis.

2. Owners, users of property, persons benefiting from property property without a legal basis but in good faith must return the yield and income earned from the time when such person knew or ought to have known the possession and use of the property or benefit from the property without any legal basis. law, except for the case specified in Article 236 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@582:
The right to demand the return of a third party

In case the possessor or user of the property has handed over the property to a third party without legal grounds, when the property owner or owner may have other rights to the property to be returned, the third party shall be obliged to return such property, unless otherwise provided for in this Code; if such property has been paid in cash or with compensation, a third party has the right to demand compensation from the person who has handed over the property to him or her.
Bộ luật dân sự@583:
Obligation to pay

The owner, holders of other rights to the property, or the person suffering damage to be returned to the property, must pay the necessary expenses that the possessor or user has to pay. property, the person who benefits from the property without a legal basis but in good faith has spent it to preserve and increase the value of the property.
Bộ luật dân sự@584:
The basis for arising liability to compensate for damage

1. Those who commit acts of infringing upon life, health, honor, dignity, prestige, property, rights and legitimate interests If another person's law causes damage, he/she must pay compensation, unless otherwise provided for by this Code or other relevant laws.

2. The person causing the damage must not be responsible for compensation in the event in case the damage is caused by force majeure events or entirely due to the fault of the aggrieved party, unless otherwise agreed or otherwise provided for by law.

3. In case of property damage, the owner or possessor of the property shall be responsible for compensating for damage, except for the case of damage arising as prescribed in Clause 2 of this Article.
Bộ luật dân sự@585:
Principle of compensation for damage

1. Actual damage must be fully and promptly compensated. The parties can agree on the level of compensation, the form of compensation in cash, in cash or in kind. object or performance of a job, compensation method once or many times, unless otherwise provided by law.

2. The person responsible for compensation may be entitled to a reduction in compensation if not is at fault or has an unintentional fault and the damage is too great for his or her economic ability.

3. When the compensation level is no longer consistent with reality, the aggrieved party or the damage-causing party has the right to claim request the Court or other competent state agency to change the compensation level.

4. When the aggrieved party is at fault in causing damage, it is not entitled to compensation for the part of the damage caused by its fault. 

5. The party whose rights and interests are infringed shall not be compensated if the damage occurs due to the failure to apply necessary and reasonable measures to prevent or limit the damage to itself.
Bộ luật dân sự@586:
Individual's capacity to take responsibility for damage compensation

1. Persons aged full eighteen years or older who cause damage must compensate by themselves.

2. Persons under fifteen years of age If the father or mother's property is not enough to compensate but the minor child causing the damage has his or her own property, then take such property to compensate for the deficit, except for the case specified in Article 599 of this Code.

A person between full fifteen years of age and under eighteen years of age, who causes damage, must compensate with his/her own property; if it is not enough, property for compensation, the father or mother must compensate for the missing part with their own property.

3. Minors, persons who have lost their civil act capacity, and people with difficulties in awareness and control. Damage-causing acts are caused by a guardian, that guardian may use the ward's property to make compensation; if the ward has no property or does not have enough property to compensate, the guardian must compensate with his or her property; If the guardian can prove that he is not at fault in the guardianship, he does not have to take his property to compensate.
Bộ luật dân sự@587:
Compensation for damage caused by more than one person

In case more than one person causes damage, those persons must jointly compensate the damage sufferer. damage is determined in proportion to each person's degree of fault; if the degree of fault cannot be determined, they must compensate for the damage in equal parts.
Bộ luật dân sự@588:
The statute of limitations for initiating a lawsuit to claim damages

The statute of limitations for initiating a lawsuit to claim for damage is 03 years from the date the claimant knows or ought to know his/her lawful rights and interests yours has been violated.
Bộ luật dân sự@593:
Time limit for enjoying compensation for damage to life and health

1. In case the aggrieved person loses his working capacity completely, the aggrieved person is entitled to compensation from the time the damage suffers. point of total loss of working capacity until death, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the aggrieved person dies, the persons for whom this person is obliged to support while alive shall enjoy the money. support from the time the person whose life is infringed dies within the following time limit:

a) Minors or pregnant persons who are children of the deceased and are still alive after birth are entitled to alimony until full eighteen years of age, except for persons from full fifteen years of age to under eighteen years of age who have engaged in labor and have earned enough income to support themselves;

b) Adults but unable to afford working capacity is entitled to alimony until death.

3. For the deceased's unborn child, the alimony is calculated from the time this person is born and is still alive.
Bộ luật dân sự@594:
Compensation for damage in case of exceeding the limit of legitimate defense

The person causing damage in the case of legitimate defense is not required to compensate the damage sufferer.

The person causing the damage Damage caused by exceeding the limit of legitimate defense must compensate the damage sufferer.
Bộ luật dân sự@595:
Compensation for damage in case of exceeding the requirement of an urgent situation

1. In case the damage occurs due to exceeding the requirement of an urgent situation, the person causing the damage must compensate the part of the damage caused by exceeding the requirements of the emergency situation for the aggrieved person.

2. The person who caused the emergency situation leading to the damage must compensate the damage sufferer.
Bộ luật dân sự@596:
Compensation for damage caused by stimulant users

1. People who, due to drinking alcohol or using other stimulants, fall into a state of loss of cognitive ability and behavior control, causing If a person intentionally uses alcohol or other stimulants to cause another person to fall into a state of loss of awareness and control over their behavior, causing damage, then compensation must be paid. must compensate the victims.
Bộ luật dân sự@597:
Compensation for damage caused by persons of the juridical person

The legal person must compensate for the damage caused by its own persons while performing the tasks assigned by the juridical person; if the juridical person has already compensated for the damage. If they cause damage, they have the right to request the person at fault in causing the damage to pay a sum of money as prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@598:
Compensation for damage caused by official duty enforcers

The State is responsible for compensating for damage caused by illegal acts of law enforcers in accordance with the Law on Liability compensation from the State.
Bộ luật dân sự@599:
Compensation for damage caused by persons under fifteen years of age or incapacitated persons for civil acts while under the direct management of schools, hospitals, or other legal entities

1. Persons who are not enough If a person who is fifteen years old, during the period of direct management of the school, causes damage, the school must compensate for the damage that occurs.

2. A person who has lost his/her civil act capacity causes damage to other people during his/her illness. If the hospital or other legal entity directly manages it, the hospital or other legal entity must compensate for the damage that occurs.

3. Schools, hospitals and other legal entities specified in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article are not compensate if they can prove that they are not at fault in management; in this case, the father, mother, guardian of the person under fifteen years of age, or the person who has lost the capacity for civil acts must pay compensation.
Bộ luật dân sự@600:
Compensation for damage caused by employees or apprentices

Individuals and legal entities must compensate for damage caused by employees or apprentices while performing their assigned work. and has the right to request employees and apprentices who are at fault in causing damage to refund a sum of money as prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@601:
Compensation for damage caused by sources of extreme danger

1. Sources of extreme danger include motorized transport vehicles, power transmission systems, industrial plants in operation. , weapons, explosives, inflammables, poisons, radioactive substances, wild animals and other sources of extreme danger as prescribed by law.

The owner of the source of extreme danger must operate and use it. , preserve, keep and transport sources of extreme danger in accordance with law.

2. Owners of sources of extreme danger must compensate for damage caused by sources of extreme danger; if If the owner has assigned another person to possess and use it, this person must compensate, unless otherwise agreed.

3. The owner, person possessing or using a source of extreme danger must compensate. usually damages even without fault, except in the following cases:

a) The damage is caused entirely by the intentional fault of the aggrieved person;

b) The damage is caused by force majeure. resistance or emergency situation, unless otherwise provided by law.

4. In case the source of extreme danger is illegally possessed or used, the person currently possessing or using the source of extreme danger illegally must compensate for damage.

When the owner, possessor, If the source of extreme danger is at fault in allowing the source of extreme danger to be illegally possessed or used, they must jointly compensate for the damage.
Bộ luật dân sự@602:
Compensation for damage caused by polluting the environment

The subject causing damage to the environment must pay compensation according to the provisions of law, even if the subject is not at fault .
Bộ luật dân sự@603:
Compensation for damage caused by animals

1. Animal owners must compensate for damage caused by animals to other people. Owners and users of animals must pay compensation for damage caused by animals. During the time of possession and use of animals, unless otherwise agreed.

2. Where the third person is completely at fault for causing the animal to cause damage to other people, the third person must compensate usually damages; if the third person and the owner are at fault, they must jointly compensate for the damage.

3. In case an animal is illegally possessed or used, causing damage, the possessor, Illegal use must compensate; when the owner, possessor or user of an animal is at fault in allowing the animal to be illegally possessed or used, he/she must jointly compensate for the damage.

4. In case an animal is allowed to freely roam according to custom, causing damage, the owner of such animal must compensate according to custom, but must not be against the law or social ethics.
Bộ luật dân sự@604:
Compensation for damage caused by trees

Owners, occupiers, and management assignees must compensate for damage caused by trees.
Bộ luật dân sự@605:
Compensation for damage caused by houses and other construction works

Owners, occupiers, persons assigned to manage and use houses and other constructions must compensate damage caused by that house or other construction work causing damage to other people.

When the builder is at fault in letting the house or other construction work cause damage, he/she must jointly compensate.
Bộ luật dân sự@606:
Compensation for damage caused by infringing upon the body

1. An individual or legal entity that infringes upon the body must compensate for the damage.

2. Damage caused by infringing upon the body includes legal expenses. to limit and remedy damage.

3. The person responsible for compensation when the body is infringed must pay compensation according to the provisions of Clause 2 of this Article and another sum of money to compensate for mental loss. for the relatives of the first heirs of the deceased, if there is no such person, the person directly taking care of the dead person is entitled to this amount. agreement; if no agreement is reached, the maximum level for each infringed body shall not exceed thirty times the base salary prescribed by the State.
Bộ luật dân sự@607:
Compensation for damage caused by trespassing graves

1. Individuals and legal entities that infringe upon other's graves must compensate for damage.

2. Damages caused by trespassing graves including reasonable costs to limit and remedy damage.

3. The person responsible for compensation in case another person's grave is infringed must pay compensation as prescribed in Clause 2 of this Article and a sum of money . other money to compensate for the mental loss of the next of kin in the order of the deceased's inheritance; if these people are not available, the person who directly takes care of the deceased is entitled to this amount. mental loss shall be agreed upon by the parties; if no agreement is reached, the maximum level for each infringed grave shall not exceed ten times the basic salary prescribed by the State.
Bộ luật dân sự@608:
Compensation for damage caused by violations of consumers' rights

Individuals and legal entities that produce or trade in goods or services that fail to ensure the quality of goods or services that cause damage compensation to consumers.

The fourth part
Inheritance
Bộ luật dân sự@609:
Inheritance rights

Individuals have the right to make a will to dispose of their property; to leave their property to their heirs according to the law; to enjoy an estate according to a will or at law. .

The heir is not an individual who has the right to inherit according to the will.
Bộ luật dân sự@610:
Equal rights to inheritance of individuals

All individuals are equal in the right to leave their property to others and to inherit according to a will or by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@611:
Time and place of opening the inheritance

1. The time of opening the inheritance is the time of the death of the property owner. In case the Court declares a person dead, the time of opening the inheritance is the date is determined in Clause 2, Article 71 of this Code.

2. The place of opening the inheritance is the last residence of the estate leaver; if the last place of residence cannot be determined, the place open inheritance is the place where the entire estate is located or where the majority of the estate is located.
Bộ luật dân sự@612:
Legacy

Legacy includes the personal property of the deceased, the portion of the deceased's property in the property shared with others.
Bộ luật dân sự@613:
Heir

Individual heir must be a person who was alive at the time of opening the inheritance or was born and was alive after the time of opening the inheritance but became pregnant before the bereavement. If the heir under the will is not an individual, it must exist at the time of opening the inheritance.
Bộ luật dân sự@614:
The time when the rights and obligations of the heir arise

From the time of opening the inheritance, the heirs have the property rights and obligations left by the deceased.
Bộ luật dân sự@615:
Perform the property obligations left by the deceased

1. The heirs are responsible for performing the property obligations within the estate left by the deceased, unless there is a other agreement.

2. In case the estate has not been divided, the property obligations left by the deceased shall be performed by the administrator of the estate according to the agreement of the heirs within the estate left by the deceased. left.

3. In case the estate has been divided, each heir shall perform the property obligations left by the deceased in proportion but not exceeding the portion of the property he has received, unless otherwise agreed. otherwise agreed.

4. In case the heir is not an individual inheriting the estate according to the will, he must also perform the property obligations left by the deceased like an individual heir.
Bộ luật dân sự@616:
The administrator of the estate

1. The administrator of the estate is the person appointed in the will or appointed by the agreement of the heirs.

2. Where the will is not only If the administrator of the estate and the heirs have not been appointed to manage the estate, the person possessing, using and managing the estate shall continue to manage the estate until the heirs are appointed to manage the estate. management of the estate.

3. In case the heir has not been identified and the estate has no manager as prescribed in Clauses 1 and 2 of this Article, the estate shall be managed by a competent state agency. .
Bộ luật dân sự@619:
Inheritance of persons who have the right to inherit each other's estates who die at the same time

In case the persons with the right to inherit each other's estate both die at the same time or are considered to have died at the same time at the time because it is impossible to determine which person dies first (hereinafter referred to as concurrent death), they are not entitled to inherit each other's estate and each person's estate shall be enjoyed by that person's heir, unless status inheritance as prescribed in Article 652 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@620:
Refusal to accept the estate

1. An heir has the right to refuse to receive the estate, except in cases where the refusal is aimed at evading the performance of his/her property obligations towards others.

2. The refusal to receive the estate must be made in writing and sent to the administrator of the estate, other heirs who are assigned the task of dividing the estate.

3. The disclaimer of the estate must be expressed before the time of division of the estate.
Bộ luật dân sự@622:
Property without an heir

In case there is no heir according to the will, according to the law or there is but is not entitled to inherit, or refuses to receive the estate, the remaining property after having fulfilled his/her obligations on property without an heir belonging to the State.
Bộ luật dân sự@623:
Statute of inheritance

1. The statute of limitations for an heir to request an estate division is 30 years for immovable property, 10 years for movable property, from the time of opening the inheritance. Within this time limit, the estate belongs to the heir who is managing the estate.In case there is no heir who is managing the estate, the estate shall be settled as follows:

a) The estate belongs to the owner. of the person possessing it as prescribed in Article 236 of this Code;

b) The estate belongs to the State, if there is no possessor specified at Point a of this Clause.

2. an heir who requests to confirm his or her inheritance right or to reject another person's inheritance is 10 years from the time of opening the inheritance.

3. The statute of limitations for requiring the heir to perform the obligations on inheritance. The property left by the deceased is 03 years from the time of opening the inheritance.
Bộ luật dân sự@624:
Will

A will is an expression of an individual's will to transfer his or her property to another person after death.
Bộ luật dân sự@625:
Testator

1. An adult who fully meets the conditions specified at Point a, Clause 1, Article 630 of this Code has the right to make a will to dispose of his or her property.
 
2. A person between full fifteen and under eighteen years of age may make a will, if his/her father, mother or guardian agrees to make a will.
Bộ luật dân sự@627:
Form of a will

The will must be in writing; if it is not possible to make a will in writing, an oral will is possible.
Bộ luật dân sự@629:
Oral will

1. In case a person's life is threatened by death and it is not possible to make a written will, an oral will can be made.

2. After 03 months, From the time of oral will, if the testator is still alive, sane and wise, the oral will will be automatically annulled.
Bộ luật dân sự@630:
Legal will

1. A lawful will must satisfy the following conditions:

a) The testator is lucid and wise while making the will; not being deceived lying, threatening, coercing;

b) The content of the will does not violate the prohibition of the law, does not contravene social ethics; the form of the will is not contrary to the provisions of the law.

2. Wills of persons aged between full fifteen and under eighteen years must be made in writing and must be approved by the father, mother or guardian in making a will.

3. Will of the restricted person. physical or illiterate persons must be made in writing by witnesses and notarized or authenticated.

4. A written will without notarization or authentication is only considered legal, if all the conditions specified in Clause 1 of this Article are met.

5. An oral will is considered legal if the oral testator shows his or her final will in front of at least two witnesses and As soon as the oral testator expresses his final will, the witness records it, signs it together, or points it out. Within 5 working days from the date the oral testator expresses his/her final will, the will must be certified by a notary public or a competent authority to certify the signature or fingerprints of the witness.
Bộ luật dân sự@633:
A will in writing without witnesses

The testator must write and sign the will himself.

The making of a written will without witnesses must be followed. prescribed in Article 631 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@634:
Written will with witnesses

In case the testator does not write the will himself, he can type it himself or ask someone else to write or type the will, but there must be at least two witnesses. wills.

The making of a written will with witnesses must comply with the provisions of Articles 631 and 632 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@635:
The will is notarized or authenticated

The testator may request notarization or certification of the will.
Bộ luật dân sự@636:
Procedures for making a will at a notary practice organization or the commune-level People's Committee

The making of a will at a notary-practicing organization or the commune-level People's Committee must follow the procedures the following:

1. The testator declares the contents of the will before a notary or a person competent to authenticate of the commune-level People's Committee. The commune-level People's Committee must record the contents declared by the testator. The notary public or a person competent to authenticate the will of the commune-level People's Committee shall sign the will;

2. If the testator cannot read or hear the will, no If you can't sign or not, you must ask a witness and this person must sign for certification in front of a notary or a person with authentication competence of the commune-level People's Committee. The commune-level People's Committee shall certify the will in the presence of the testator and witnesses.
Bộ luật dân sự@638:
A written will is as valid as a notarized or authenticated will

1. A will of an active-duty soldier certified by a unit leader at the company level or higher, if military personnel cannot require notarization or authentication.

2. Will of the person traveling on a ship or aircraft certified by the commander of that vehicle.

3. Will of the person who is traveling on board a ship or aircraft. receiving treatment at a hospital, other medical treatment or nursing facility certified by the person in charge of that hospital or facility.

4. Will of the person who is doing survey, exploration and research work in the hospital. forests, mountains and islands certified by the person in charge of the unit.

5. Wills of Vietnamese citizens living abroad certified by Vietnamese consular offices or diplomatic representatives in that country. .

6. The will of the person being held in custody, temporary custody, serving prison sentence, or serving administrative handling measures at an educational institution or medical treatment facility, certified by the person. in charge of that facility.
Bộ luật dân sự@639:
The will is prepared by a notary at his/her residence

1. The testator may request the notary to come to his/her residence to make a will.

2. Procedures for making a will. A will at the place of residence shall be carried out in the same manner as the procedure for making a will at a notary public practice organization according to the provisions of Article 636 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@640:
Modify, supplement, replace, annul the will

1. The testator may amend, supplement, replace, cancel the will made at any time. 

2. In case the testator adds a will, the made will and the additional part have the same legal effect; if a part of the made will and the supplemented part contradict each other, only the additional will take legal effect.

3. In case the testator replaces the will with a new will, the previous will will be annulled.
Bộ luật dân sự@641:
To keep the will

1. The testator may request the notarial practice organization to keep or send another person to keep the will.

2. In the case of a notary practice organization a notary who keeps a will must preserve it in accordance with this Code and the law on notarization.

3. A testament holder has the following obligations:

a) keep the will secret;

b) Preserve and preserve the will; if the will is lost or damaged, it must immediately notify the testator;

c) Hand over the will testament to the heir or the person competent to announce the will, upon the death of the testator, the handover of the will must be made in writing, signed by the giver and receiver and in the presence of the testator. at least two witnesses.
Bộ luật dân sự@642:
The will is lost or damaged

1. From the time of opening the inheritance, if the will is lost or damaged to the extent that the will of the maker cannot be fully expressed. a will and there is no evidence to prove the true will of the testator, it is considered that there is no will and the provisions of law on inheritance shall apply.

2. In the case of an estate If the will has not been divided yet but the will is found, the estate shall be divided according to the will.

3. During the statute of limitations for requesting the division of the estate, if the divided estate is found but the will is found, the estate must be redistributed according to the will if the person who has not divided the estate finds a will. inheritance according to the will.
Bộ luật dân sự@643:
Valid validity

1. A Will takes effect from the time of inheritance.

2. A Will is not valid in whole or in part in the following cases:

a) The testamentary heir dies before or at the same time as the testator;

b) The agency or organization designated as the heir no longer exists at the time of opening the inheritance .

In case there are many heirs under the will and one of them dies before or at the same time as the testator, one of the many agencies or organizations designated to inherit according to the will no longer exists. At the time of opening the inheritance, only the part of the will related to this individual, agency or organization is not valid.

3. A will is not valid if the estate is left to the heir. the inheritance no longer exists at the time of opening the inheritance; if there is only a part of the estate left to the heir, the will for the remaining part of the estate is still valid.

4. When the will is partially invalid method without affecting the validity of the remaining parts, only that part has no effect.

5. When a person leaves multiple wills over a property, only the last will is valid.
Bộ luật dân sự@644:
The heir does not depend on the contents of the will

1. The following people are still entitled to a share of the estate equal to two-thirds of a legal heir if the estate is divided. according to the law, in case they are not allowed to enjoy the estate by the testator or only receive less than two-thirds of the estate:

a) Minor children, father, mother, wife, husband ;

b) Adult children without working capacity.

2. The provisions of Clause 1 of this Article do not apply to persons who refuse to receive the estate as prescribed in Article 620 or they are persons who do not have the right to inherit the estate as prescribed in Clause 1, Article 621 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@645:
Inheritance used for worship

1. In case the testator leaves a part of the estate to be used for worship, that part of the estate shall not be inherited and shall be assigned to the deceased . designated in the management will to perform the worship; if the designated person fails to properly perform the will or according to the agreement of the heirs, the heirs have the right to hand over the portion of the estate to be used for the purposes of worship. worship for others to manage for worship.

In case the person leaving the estate does not appoint a manager of the worshiping estate, the heirs shall appoint a manager of the worship estate.

Case if all the heirs under the will have died, the portion of the estate used for worshiping belongs to the person who is lawfully managing the estate among the legal heirs.

2. Case If the deceased's entire estate is not enough to pay his/her property obligations, part of the estate may not be used for worship.
Bộ luật dân sự@646:
Intestate gift

1. An inheritance is the act of giving part of an estate by the testator to another person. The bequest must be clearly stated in the will.

2. The giftee being an individual must be alive at the time of opening the inheritance or being born and alive after the time of opening the inheritance but became pregnant before the bereavement dies. must exist at the time of opening the inheritance.

3 of the testator, the part of the will shall also be used to perform the remaining obligations of this person.
Bộ luật dân sự@647:
Disclosure of wills

1. In case a written will is kept at a notary practice organization, the notary public is the one who publishes the will.

2. If the testator does not designate or appoints a testator but the designee refuses to publish the will, the heirs the remaining successors shall agree to appoint a will announcer.

3. After the time of opening the inheritance, the will announcer must make copies and send the will to all persons related to the contents of the will.
 
4. The person who receives a copy of the will has the right to request a comparison with the original of the will.

5. In case the will is made in a foreign language, that will must be translated into Vietnamese and must be notarized or authenticated.
Bộ luật dân sự@648:
Explaining the content of the will

In case the content of the will is unclear leading to different interpretations, the heirs under the will must jointly explain the contents of the will based on the will prior genuine will of the deceased, taking into account the deceased's relationship with the heirs under the will. .

If there is a part of the will that cannot be explained but does not affect the rest of the will, only the unexplained part is not valid.
Bộ luật dân sự@649:
Inheritance according to law

Inheritance according to law is inheritance according to the line of inheritance, the conditions and order of inheritance are prescribed by law.
Bộ luật dân sự@652:
Inheritance of the estate

In case a child of the estate leaver dies before or at the same time as the leaver, the grandchild shall be entitled to the portion of the estate which his father or mother shall enjoy if If the grandchild also dies before or at the same time as the person who left the estate, the great-grandchild shall enjoy the portion of the estate that the great-grandchild's father or mother would have enjoyed if he were still alive.
Bộ luật dân sự@653:
Inheritance relationship between adopted child and adoptive father, adoptive mother and biological father, biological mother

Adopted child and adoptive father, adoptive mother inherit each other's estate and also inherit according to prescribed in Articles 651 and 652 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@654:
Inheritance relationship between stepchild and stepfather, stepmother

Stepson and stepfather, stepmother, if there is a relationship of caring and nurturing each other like father and son, mother and child will inherit the inheritance. each other's property and may also inherit the estate according to the provisions of Articles 652 and 653 of this Code.
Bộ luật dân sự@655:
Inheritance in case husband and wife have divided common property; husband and wife are applying for divorce or are married to another person

1. In case husband and wife have divided common property when the marriage still exists but after that one person dies, the surviving person still inherits the estate.

2. In case the husband and wife apply for a divorce but have not been or have been granted a divorce by the Court by judgment or the decision has not yet taken legal effect, if a person dies, the living person still inherits the estate.

3. The person who was a spouse of a person at the time of his/her death, even though the person was later married If you marry someone else, you will still inherit the estate.
Bộ luật dân sự@656:
Meeting of heirs

1. After the announcement of the opening of an inheritance or a will is published, the heirs may meet to agree on the following: n
a) Appoint an estate administrator, the person to divide the estate, determine the rights and obligations of these people, if the person leaving the estate is not specified in the will;

b) Method of division estate.

2. Any agreement of the heirs must be in writing.
Bộ luật dân sự@657:
Distributor of the estate

1. The person who distributes the estate may be concurrently the administrator of the estate designated in the will or appointed by agreement of the heirs.

2. The person distributing the estate must divide the estate in accordance with the will or the agreement of the heirs at law.

3. The person who distributes the estate shall enjoy remuneration, if he or she leaves the estate to him or her. permission in the will or the agreed heirs.
Bộ luật dân sự@659:
Dividing the estate according to the will

1. The division of the estate is done according to the will of the testator; if the will does not clearly define the portion of each heir, the will The property shall be equally divided among the persons designated in the will, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the will determines the division of the estate in kind, the heirs shall receive the accompanying kind. yields or profits obtained from such in-kind or suffers from the reduced value of the in-kind up to the time of division of the estate; if the in-kind is destroyed due to another person's fault, the heir has the right to claim claim for damages.

3. In case the will only determines the division of the estate according to the proportion of the total value of the estate, this ratio shall be calculated on the value of the remaining estate at the time of the will. division of the estate.
Bộ luật dân sự@660:
Dividing the estate according to the law

1. When dividing the estate, if there is an heir in the same row who has become pregnant but has not yet been born, a part of the estate must be set aside equal to that of the heir. other heirs are entitled to it so that if such heir is still alive at birth; if he dies before birth, the other heirs are entitled to it.

2. The heirs have the right to claim the division of the estate. in kind; if it cannot be divided equally in kind, the heirs may agree on the valuation of the kind and agree on the recipient of the in-kind; if no agreement is reached, the in-kind shall be sold for division.
Bộ luật dân sự@661:
Limited division of the estate

If, by the will of the testator or by agreement of all the heirs, the estate is only distributed after a certain period of time, only After that time limit has expired, the estate will be divided.

In case of request for division of the inheritance, the division of the estate seriously affects the life of the surviving spouse and family, the surviving party shall living has the right to request the court to determine the portion of the estate that the heirs are entitled to but have not distributed the estate within a certain period of time, this time limit shall not exceed 03 years from the time of opening the inheritance. Within 3 years, if the surviving party proves that the division of the estate still seriously affects their family's life, they have the right to request the Court to extend it once but for no more than 3 years.
Bộ luật dân sự@662:
Dividing the estate in case there is a new heir or an heir whose inheritance is denied

1. In case the estate has been divided but a new heir appears, it will not be done. redistribution of the estate in kind, but the heirs who have received the estate must pay the new heir an amount corresponding to his or her share of the estate at the time of division of the inheritance in proportion to in proportion to the portion of the estate received, unless otherwise agreed.

2. In case the estate has been divided and an heir is denied the right to inherit, that person must return the estate or make payment. an amount equivalent to the value of the estate enjoyed at the time of division of inheritance among the heirs, unless otherwise agreed.

Part Five
LAW APPLICABLE TO CIVIL RELATIONSHIP FOREIGN ELEMENTS
Bộ luật dân sự@663:
Scope of application

1. This section provides for the law applicable to civil relations involving foreign elements.

In case of other law provisions on applicable law for civil relations involving foreign elements that do not contravene the provisions of Articles 664 to 671 of this Code, such law shall apply; if contrary, relevant provisions of Part Fifth of this Code shall be applied. apply.

2. A civil relationship involving a foreign element is a civil relationship in one of the following cases:

a) At least one of the parties involved is an individual or a legal entity. foreign individuals;

b) The participating parties are all Vietnamese citizens, Vietnamese legal entities, but the establishment, change, performance or termination of such relationship occurs in a foreign country;

c ) The involved parties are all Vietnamese citizens or Vietnamese legal entities, but the subject matter of such civil relations is abroad.
Bộ luật dân sự@664:
Determining the law applicable to civil relations involving foreign elements

1. The law applicable to civil relations involving foreign elements shall be determined under international treaties To which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a contracting party or the laws of Vietnam.

2. In case of an international treaty to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a contracting party or Vietnamese law stipulates that the parties the right to choose, the law applicable to civil relations involving foreign elements shall be determined at the choice of the parties.

3. In case the applicable law cannot be determined as prescribed in Clause 1 of this Article. and Clause 2 of this Article, the applicable law is the law of the country that has the closest connection with that civil relationship involving foreign elements.
Bộ luật dân sự@665:
Application of international treaties to civil relations involving foreign elements

1. In case an international treaty to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is a signatory contains provisions on rights and obligations of the parties to civil relations involving foreign elements, the provisions of that international treaty shall apply.

2. In the case of an international treaty to which the Socialist Republic of Vietnam is concerned. If a member is a member, the provisions of that international treaty are different from those of this Part and other laws on the law applicable to civil relations involving foreign elements, the provisions of such international treaty shall apply.
Bộ luật dân sự@666:
Application of international custom

The parties may choose international custom in the case specified in Clause 2, Article 664 of this Code . contrary to the basic principles of Vietnamese law, Vietnamese law shall prevail.
Bộ luật dân sự@667:
Application of foreign law

Bộ luật dân sự@668:
The scope of the law referred to

1. The referenced law includes provisions on determining applicable law and regulations on rights and obligations of the parties to the relationship. civil relations, except for the case specified in Clause 4 of this Article.

2. In case of reference to Vietnamese law, the provisions of Vietnamese law on rights and obligations of the parties to civil relations shall apply.

3. In case of reference to the law of a third country, the provisions of the law of the third country on the rights and obligations of the parties to the civil relationship shall apply.

4. In the case specified in Clause 2, Article 664 of this Code, the law chosen by the parties is the provisions on the rights and obligations of the parties to the civil relationship, excluding the provisions on determining the law. applicable law.
Bộ luật dân sự@669:
Application of the law of a country with multiple legal systems

Where foreign law is not applicable

a) Consequences of application of the law The foreign law is contrary to the basic principles of Vietnamese law;

b) The content of the foreign law cannot be determined despite the application of necessary measures in accordance with the procedural law. 

2. Where foreign law is not applicable as prescribed in Clause 1 of this Article, Vietnamese law shall apply.
Bộ luật dân sự@671:
The statute of limitations

Bộ luật dân sự@672:
The basis for determining the law applicable to stateless persons and persons with multiple nationalities

1. The case where the law is referred to is the law of the country of which the individual has nationality but such individual is a stateless person, the applicable law is the law of the country where that person resides at the time a civil relationship involving a foreign element arises. If a person has a place of residence at the time a civil relationship involving a foreign element arises, the applicable law is the law of the country where he or she has the closest relationship.

2. Where the law is cited referred to is the law of the country of which the individual has nationality but that individual is a person of multiple nationalities, the applicable law is the law of the country where that person has nationality and resides at the time of arising of civil relations. If that person has multiple places of residence or the place of residence or place of residence and the place of residence is not determined and the place of nationality is different at the time of the arising of a civil relationship involving a foreign element, the law The applicable law is the law of the country in which the individual has a nationality and is most closely related.

Where the law is referred to is the law of the country of which the individual has a nationality but the individual is If a person has multiple nationalities, including Vietnamese nationality, the applicable law is Vietnamese law.
Bộ luật dân sự@673:
Civil legal capacity of an individual

1. An individual's civil legal capacity is determined according to the law of the country of which he or she has nationality.

Bộ luật dân sự@675:

Bộ luật dân sự@677:
Classification of property

Bộ luật dân sự@679:

Bộ luật dân sự@680:
Inheritance

1. Inheritance is determined according to the law of the country of which the person leaving the estate had the nationality immediately before his death.

2. The exercise of the right of inheritance to with immovable property as determined under the laws of the country in which such immovable property is located.
Bộ luật dân sự@682:
Guardian

Guardian is defined according to the laws of the country where the ward resides.
Bộ luật dân sự@683:
Contract

1. The parties to a contractual relationship may agree to choose the law applicable to the contract, except for the case specified in Clauses 4, 5 and 6 of this Article. If the parties do not agree on the applicable law, the law of the country most closely related to the contract shall prevail.

2. The law of the following country shall be deemed to be the law of the country. most closely related to the contract:

a) The law of the country where the seller resides if he is an individual or the place of establishment if he is a legal entity for the contract of sale of goods;

b ) The law of the country where the service provider resides if he is an individual or the place of establishment if he is a legal entity for a service contract;

c) The law of the country where the recipient is a resident if he is an individual person or place of establishment if it is a legal entity for the contract of licensing or assignment of intellectual property rights;

d) The law of the country where the employee regularly performs work for the contract If the employee regularly performs work in many different countries or it is not possible to determine where the employee regularly performs work, the law of the country with which the employment contract is most closely related is the law of the country where the employer resides in respect of an individual or is established in the case of a legal entity.

đ) The law of the country in which the consumer resides in respect of a consumer contract.

3. In case it can be proved that the law of a country other than the law mentioned in Clause 2 of this Article has a closer relationship with the contract, the applicable law is the law of that country.

4. Where the contract subject is immovable property, the law applicable to the transfer of ownership rights or other rights to the property being immovable, the lease of immovable property or the use of the immovable property as security. performance is the law of the country where the immovable property is located.

5. In case the law selected by the parties in the labor contract or consumer contract affects the minimum interests of employees and consumers in accordance with Vietnamese law, Vietnamese law shall apply. use.

6. The parties may agree to change the law applicable to the contract, but such change must not affect the lawful rights and interests of a third party before the change of applicable law, unless otherwise third party agrees.

7. The form of a contract is determined by the law applicable to that contract. In case the form of a contract is not consistent with the form of a contract under the law applicable to that contract, but is consistent with the form of a contract under the law of the country where the contract is concluded or the law of Vietnam, that form of contract is recognized in Vietnam.
Bộ luật dân sự@684:
Unilateral legal act

The law applicable to unilateral legal acts is the law of the country where the individual who established the act resides or where the juridical person establishes the act established.
Bộ luật dân sự@685:
The obligation to return due to possession, use, or gain in property has no legal basis

The obligation to return due to possession, use, or gain in property has no grounds for it. The law is determined according to the law of the country where the possession and use of the property or the place where the benefits arise without a legal basis.
Bộ luật dân sự@686:
Performing work without authorization

The parties may agree to choose the law applicable to the performance of work without authorization. In the absence of agreement, the applicable law is the law of the country where the work is performed without authorization.
Bộ luật dân sự@687:
Compensation for extra-contractual damage

1. The parties may agree to choose the law applicable to the compensation for non-contractual damage, except for the case specified in Clause 2 of this Article. In the absence of an agreement, the law of the country where the consequences of the event of damage arose shall apply.

2. Where the damage-causing party and the aggrieved party have a place of residence, for individuals or place of establishment, for juridical persons located in the same country, the laws of that country shall apply.
